00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         epics_ca.c
00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt (Modified RA36)
00005 
00006   Contents:     Epics channel access device driver Version 3.14
00007 
00008   class driver is generic with Demand and Measured Variables
00009 
00010   device driver list
00011   DEVICE_DRIVER epics_driver[] = {
00012                                        // initial demand value taken from instrument
00013        { "EPICSBB", epics_ca, <nchans>, null, DF_PRIO_DEVICE | DF_NOUPDALL},
00014        { "" }
00015   };
00016 
00017   EPICS base package must be installed   (caRepeater, libca.so libCom.so)
00018 
00019   $Id: epics_ca.c,v 1.2 2011-06-25 20:56:00 l_data Exp $
00020

00117                                                                   //             8 4 2 1
00118 GFA_msg KPS1stamsg000f[] = {                                      // status bits 3+2+1+0
00119     // bit 0 : set : Soll power on
00120     // bit 1 : set : Soll power off
00121     // bit 2 : set : Ist  power on
00122     // bit 3 : set : Ist  power off 
00123     {0x0000, "Soll and Ist NOT ON and NOT OFF"                     },      //    0 0 0 0
00124     {0x0001, "Soll ON - Ist NOT ON and NOT OFF"                    },      //    0 0 0 1
00125     {0x0002, "Soll OFF - Ist NOT ON and NOT OFF"                   },      //    0 0 1 0
00126     {0x0003, "Soll ON and OFF - Ist NOT ON and NOT OFF"            },      //    0 0 1 1
00127     {0x0004, "Soll NOT ON and NOT OFF - Ist ON"                    },      //    0 1 0 0
00128     {0x0005, "On"                                                  },      //    0 1 0 1
00129     {0x0006, "Soll OFF - Ist ON"                                   },      //    0 1 1 0
00130     {0x0007, "Soll ON and OFF, Ist ON"                             },      //    0 1 1 1
00131     {0x0008, "Soll NOT ON and NOT OFF - Ist OFF"                   },      //    1 0 0 0
00132     {0x0009, "Soll On - Ist OFF"                                   },      //    1 0 0 1
00133     {0x000a, "Off"                                                 },      //    1 0 1 0
00134     {0x000b, "Soll ON and OFF - Ist OFF"                           },      //    1 0 1 1
00135     {0x000c, "Soll NOT ON and NOT OFF - Ist ON and OFF"            },      //    1 1 0 0
00136     {0x000d, "Soll ON - Ist ON and OFF"                            },      //    1 1 0 1
00137     {0x000e, "Soll OFF - Ist ON and OFF"                           },      //    1 1 1 0
00138     {0x000f, "Soll ON and OFF - Ist ON and OFF"                    }       //    1 1 1 1

00360 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00361 
00362 char *castatestr(enum channel_state castate) {
00363   
00364   switch(castate) {
00365     case cs_never_conn:
00366          strcpy(&smsg[0],"Server not found or unavailable");
00367       break;
00368 
00369     case cs_prev_conn:
00370          strcpy(&smsg[0],"Previously connected to server");
00371       break;
00372 
00373     case cs_conn:
00374          strcpy(&smsg[0],"Connected to server");
00375       break;
00376 
00377     case cs_closed:
00378          strcpy(&smsg[0],"Channel deleted by user");
00379       break;
00380 
00381     default:
00382       strcpy(&smsg[0],"**UNKNOWN STATE**");
00383   }
00384   return &smsg[0];
00385 }
00386 
00387 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00388 //
00389 // epics_ca_set_pending : 
00390 //   BOOL pendig
00391 //         TRUE        increment info->pending blocking in range (tolerance) checks 
00392 //                     until all pending operations accomplished
00393 //         FALSE       decrement info->pending.  in range (tolerance) checks will
00394 //                     be evaluated when all dependecies are released
00395 //
00396 INT epics_ca_set_pending (CA_INFO *info, BOOL pending) {
00397    INT status;
00398 
00399    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00400    if (info) {
00401      if (pending) {
00402        if (info->pending == 0) cm_msg(MLOG,"","*** Blocking Tolerance InRange checking");
00403        info->pending++;
00404      } else {
00405        if (info->pending > 0) {
00406          info->pending--;
00407          if (info->pending == 0) 
00408             cm_msg(MLOG,"","*** Tolerance InRange checking not blocked anymore");
00409        } else {
00410          cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_set_pending","PROGRAMMING ERROR releasing pending "
00411                                               "AND info->pending == 0");
00412        }
00413      }
00414    }
00415    return status;
00416 }
00417 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00418 
00419 // exception handler callback
00420 
00421 void epics_ca_exception_handler( struct exception_handler_args eargs) {
00422   char buf[512];
00423   char *pname;
00424 
00425 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00426   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : ++epics_ca_exception_handler()\n", ss_time());
00427 #endif
00428 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
00429    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_exception_handler()");
00430 #endif
00431   if (eargs.chid) {
00432     sprintf(buf,"%s - chan=%s op=%d data_type = %s count=%d",
00433                  eargs.ctx, ca_name(eargs.chid), eargs.op, dbr_type_to_text(eargs.type),
00434                  eargs.count);
00435   } else {
00436     sprintf(buf,"%s - op=%d", eargs.ctx, eargs.op);
00437   }
00438   cm_msg(MLOG,"","Status: %d EXCEPTION: %s",eargs.stat,buf);
00439   ca_signal(eargs.stat, buf);
00440 
00441 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
00442    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_exception_handler()");
00443 #endif
00444 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00445   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_exception_handler()\n", ss_time());
00446 #endif
00447 }
00448 
00449 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00450 
00451 // connection handler callback
00452 
00453 void epics_ca_connection_handler( struct connection_handler_args cargs) {
00454 
00455 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00456   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : ++epics_ca_connection_handler()\n", ss_time());
00457 #endif
00458 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
00459    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_connection_handler()");
00460 #endif
00461   
00462   if (cargs.chid) {
00463     CA_INFO *pinfo;
00464     int i,status;
00465 
00466     pinfo = (CA_INFO *) ca_puser(cargs.chid);
00467     if (pinfo) {
00468       BOOL found;
00469 
00470       /* search channel index */
00471       for (found = FALSE, i = 0; i < pinfo->num_channels; i++) {
00472         if (*(pinfo->pchid+i) == cargs.chid) {  // matching channel ID?
00473 
00474           if (cargs.op == CA_OP_CONN_UP) {
00475             if (*(pinfo->subscribed+i)) {
00476               cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) RECONNECTED",i,ca_name(cargs.chid));
00477 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00478               if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : Channel %d(%s) RECONNECTED\n", ss_time(),
00479                               i,ca_name(cargs.chid));
00480 #endif
00481               if (!*(pinfo->found+i)) {
00482                 *(pinfo->found+i) = TRUE;
00483                 cm_msg(MLOG,"","epics_ca_connection_handler:  found flag of channel %d"
00484                                "(%s)was not set yet",i,ca_name(cargs.chid));
00485               }
00486             } else {
00487 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
00488               cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) CONNECTED",i,ca_name(cargs.chid));
00489 #endif
00490 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00491               if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : Channel %d(%s) CONNECTED\n", ss_time(),
00492                               i,ca_name(cargs.chid));
00493 #endif
00494               // chan specific: omit channels with S-flag e.g.: returning strings
00495               //                and :COM:2 channels
00496               if ((strchr(pinfo->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'S') == NULL)&&
00497                (strstr(pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,":COM:2")==NULL)){
00498                 if (!pinfo->subscribe_disabled) {
00499                   cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) CONNECTED",i,ca_name(cargs.chid));
00500                   // subscribe event handler callback for this channel when not created
00501                   // subscribed value is converted to float
00502                   status = ca_create_subscription(DBR_FLOAT,1,*(pinfo->pchid+i),DBE_LOG|
00503                                        DBE_VALUE, epics_ca_event_handler, pinfo, NULL);
00504                   if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL)) {
00505                     cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_connection_handler", "Channel %d(%s): "
00506                       "ca_create_subscription() returned status 0x%X = \"%s\"",i,
00507                       pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,status,
00508                       ca_message(status));
00509                   } else {
00510 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
00511                     cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): CA event handler (float) will be "
00512                                    "installed",i,
00513                                 pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,status);
00514 #endif
00515                     *(pinfo->subscribed+i) = TRUE;
00516                     /* NOTE: ca_pend_io(0.01); may not be called in this event handler */
00517                   }
00518                 }
00519               } else {
00520                 if (strchr(pinfo->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'S'))
00521                   cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): S flag: CA event handler will NOT be "
00522                        "installed", i, pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i); 
00523 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00524                else if (strstr(pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,":COM:2"))
00525                   cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): COM Channel : CA event handler will NO"
00526                     "T be installed",i,pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i); 
00527 #endif
00528                 *(pinfo->subscribed+i) = TRUE; // mark as handled
00529               }
00530               *(pinfo->found+i) = TRUE; // mark channel as found
00531             }
00532           //if (strchr(pinfo->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'C') != NULL)
00533               *(pinfo->down+i) = FALSE;     // mark channel to be NOT down
00534           } else {
00535             cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) is DOWN",i,ca_name(cargs.chid));
00536           //if (strchr(pinfo->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'C') != NULL)
00537               *(pinfo->down+i) = TRUE;    // mark channel to be down
00538             *(pinfo->firstread+i) = TRUE; // mark channel for first read after DOWN
00539           }
00540           found = TRUE;
00541           break;
00542         } 
00543       } // for all channels
00544 
00545       if (!found)
00546         cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_connection_handler","Channel %s NOT found in list!",
00547                                                     ca_name(cargs.chid));
00548     } else {
00549       cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_connection_handler","NULL pointer returned by ca_puser()");
00550     }
00551   } else {
00552     cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_connection_handler","channel id nil returned as argument");
00553   }
00554 
00555 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
00556   cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_connection_handler()");
00557 #endif
00558 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00559   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_connection_handler()\n", ss_time());
00560 #endif
00561 }
00562 
00563 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00564 
00565 // event handler callback
00566 
00567 void epics_ca_event_handler(struct event_handler_args args) {
00568    CA_INFO *pinfo;
00569    int      i;
00570    BOOL     found;
00571 
00572 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00573   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : ++epics_ca_event_handler()\n", ss_time());
00574 #endif
00575 #ifdef MIDEBUGE1
00576    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_event_handler()");
00577 #endif
00578 
00579    found = FALSE;
00580  
00581    pinfo = (CA_INFO *) args.usr;
00582 
00583    if (pinfo) {
00584      /* find channel index */
00585      for (i = 0; i < pinfo->num_channels; i++) {
00586        if (*(pinfo->pchid+i) == args.chid) {  // matching channel ID?
00587          if (args.type == DBR_FLOAT) {        // data type is pure float?
00588            float tval;
00589 
00590            if (*(pinfo->subscribed+i) != TRUE) {
00591              *(pinfo->subscribed+i) = TRUE;
00592              cm_msg(MLOG,"","epics_ca_event_handler: Subscribed flag not yet set for"
00593                "channel %d(%s)",i,pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
00594            }
00595 
00596            if (*(pinfo->down+i)) {
00597 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
00598               cm_msg(MLOG,"","epics_ca_event_handler: channel %d(%s) Marked DOWN. Now "
00599                 "set to NOT DOWN",i,pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
00600 #endif
00601           //if (strchr(pinfo->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'C') != NULL)
00602               *(pinfo->down+i) = FALSE;     // mark channel to be NOT down
00603            }
00604            if (args.dbr) {
00605              tval = *((float *)args.dbr);
00606 #ifdef MIDEBUGE
00607              cm_msg(MLOG,"","callback for channel %d(%s): value %f", i, 
00608                             pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,tval);
00609 #endif
00610 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00611              if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : callback for channel %d(%s): value %f\n", 
00612                   ss_time(),i,pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,tval);
00613 #endif
00614              if ((args.status != ECA_NORMAL) && (*(pinfo->status+i)!=args.status)) {
00615                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","epics_ca_event_handler: WARNING Status %d = \"%s\" for "
00616                                 "channel %d(%s)", args.status, ca_message(args.status),
00617                                 i,pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
00618              }
00619              *(pinfo->status+i) = args.status;
00620              if (pinfo->array) {
00621                *(pinfo->lastget+i) = ss_time();
00622                if (*(pinfo->array+i) != tval) {
00623 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
00624                  char *tpos;
00625 
00626                  // channel has <device>:<spec>
00627                  if ((tpos=strchr(pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,':'))
00628                    != NULL) {
00629                    int j;
00630 
00631                    for (j = 0; j < N_GFA_TYPES; j++) {
00632                      // find type
00633                     if (strcmp(gfatype[j].type,pinfo->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i)==0){
00634                        GFA_channel *tc;
00635                        int k;
00636 #ifdef MIDEBUGE
00637                        cm_msg(MLOG,"","Found type %s", gfatype[j].type);
00638 #endif
00639                        tc = gfatype[j].tc;
00640                        for (k=0; k < gfatype[j].nc; k++) {  // channels of this type
00641 
00642                          if (!(tc+k)) continue;
00643 
00644                          if (strcmp(tpos,(tc+k)->spec ) == 0) { // matching :<spec>
00645                            int l;
00646                            GFA_mask *cm;
00647 #ifdef MIDEBUGE
00648                            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Found spec %s", (tc+k)->spec);
00649 #endif
00650                            cm = (tc+k)->cm;
00651                            for (l = 0; l < (tc+k)->ns; l++) { // for all masks
00652                              int m;
00653                              int ttval, tarr;
00654                              GFA_msg      *sm;
00655 
00656                              if (!(cm+l)) continue;
00657 #ifdef MIDEBUGE
00658                              cm_msg(MLOG,"","Checking Mask 0x%4.4X",(cm+l)->mask);
00659 #endif
00660                              ttval = (int)tval & (cm+l)->mask; 
00661                              tarr  = (int) *(pinfo->array+i) & (cm+l)->mask;
00662                              if (*(pinfo->array+i) == -2.f) tarr = 0; // hide setup flag
00663                              if (( ttval != tarr)||(*(pinfo->array+i) == -2.f)) {
00664                                char *tpost,*tposa;
00665                                tpost = tposa = NULL;
00666 
00667                                sm = (cm+l)->sm;
00668                                for (m = 0; m < (cm+l)->nm; m++) {
00669                                  if (!(sm+m)) continue;
00670                            //    cm_msg(MLOG,"","check Value 0x%4.4X : \"%s\"",
00671                            //                   (sm+m)->value, (sm+m)->msg);
00672                                  if ((sm+m)->value == ttval) {
00673                                    if (tpost) cm_msg(MLOG,"","New value: %s overwritten"
00674                                                 " by %s", tpost, (sm+m)->msg);
00675                                    tpost = (sm+m)->msg;
00676                                  }
00677                                  if ((sm+m)->value == tarr)  {
00678                                    if (tposa) cm_msg(MLOG,"","Prev value: %s overwritten"
00679                                                 " by %s", tposa, (sm+m)->msg);
00680                                    tposa = (sm+m)->msg;
00681                                  }
00682                                } // for all values
00683 
00684                                if (tpost) {
00685                                  if (*(pinfo->array+i) == -2.f) tposa = NULL;//hide setup
00686                                  if (tposa) {
00687                                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","%s: \"%s\" changed to \"%s\"",
00688                                      pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
00689                                      tposa, tpost);
00690                                  } else {
00691                                    if (strstr(pinfo->settings.channel_names+
00692                                               CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,":STA:")) {
00693                                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%s: Current status is \"%s\"",
00694                                        pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
00695                                        tpost);
00696                                    } else if (strstr(pinfo->settings.channel_names+
00697                                                      CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,":COM:")) {
00698 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00699                                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%s: Current RAW command is \"%s\"",
00700                                        pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
00701                                        tpost);
00702 #else
00703                                      // DO NOTHING
00704 #endif
00705                                    } else {
00706                                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%s: \"%s\" is currently set",
00707                                        pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
00708                                        tpost);
00709                                    }
00710                                  }
00711                                } else {
00712                                  // NIY nothing assigned to mask
00713                                }
00714                              }
00715                            } // for all masks
00716                            break;
00717                          }
00718                        } // for all channels of this type
00719                        break;
00720                      } 
00721                    } // for all GFA types
00722                  }
00723 #endif
00724                  // First reading after connection was down
00725                  if (*(pinfo->firstread+i)) {
00726                    // R-flag is set
00727                    if (strchr(pinfo->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'R')) {
00728                      // demand value and readout of this channel are different
00729                      // send demand again 
00730                      if (*(pinfo->demand+i) != tval) {
00731                        cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) UP again. Demand may not have been"
00732                             " set and R(eset) flag set -> Setting demand %f again",i,
00733                             pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
00734                             *(pinfo->demand+i));
00735                        // for this channel and dependent channels when PNZV flags set 
00736                        // force setting demand value
00737                        epics_ca_set(pinfo,i,*(pinfo->demand+i),FALSE,TRUE); 
00738                      }
00739                    } 
00740                    *(pinfo->firstread+i) = FALSE;
00741                  } 
00742                  *(pinfo->array+i) = tval;
00743                }
00744              }
00745            } else {
00746              cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_event_handler","Channel %d(%s): NULL pointer to "
00747                   "data returned as dbr argument!", i,
00748                    pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i); 
00749            }
00750          } else {
00751 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00752            cm_msg(MLOG,"","epics_ca_event_handler: channel %d(%s): Unsupported data "
00753                           "type %s", i, pinfo->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
00754                           dbr_type_to_text(args.type));
00755 #endif
00756          }
00757          found = TRUE;
00758          break;
00759        }
00760      }
00761    }
00762 
00763    if (!found && (args.status != ECA_NORMAL)) {
00764      cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_event_handler","WARNING Status %d = \"%s\"", args.status, 
00765                                             ca_message(args.status));
00766    }
00767 #ifdef MIDEBUGE1
00768    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_event_handler()");
00769 #endif
00770 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00771   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_event_handler()\n", ss_time());
00772 #endif
00773 }
00774 
00775 /*---- device driver routines --------------------------------------*/
00776 
00777 INT epics_ca_init(HNDLE hKey, void **pinfo, INT channels) {
00778    int status, i;
00779    HNDLE hDB, subkey;
00780    CA_INFO *info;
00781    enum channel_state castate;
00782    char tpath[MAX_ODB_PATH];
00783    char *pnames;
00784    BOOL loaded;
00785 
00786 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00787    sprintf(tpath,"EPICS_ca_%d.log",ss_time());
00788    fp = fopen(tpath,"w");
00789    if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : ++epics_ca_init(%d)\n",ss_time(),channels);
00790 #endif
00791 
00792 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
00793    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_init(init %d channels)",channels);
00794 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
00795    cm_msg(MLOG,"","ss_time()'ed Info written to %s",tpath);
00796 #endif
00797 #endif
00798 
00799    pnames = NULL;
00800    loaded = FALSE;
00801 
00802    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00803 
00804    /* allocate info structure */
00805    info = calloc(1, sizeof(CA_INFO)); 
00806    *pinfo = info;       // must be done first else core dump on error return
00807 
00808    /* check if necessary event variables are defined */
00809    if (!getenv("EPICS_CA_AUTO_ADDR_LIST") || !getenv("EPICS_CA_ADDR_LIST") ||
00810        !getenv("EPICS_CA_SERVER_PORT")) {
00811       if (!getenv("EPICS_CA_AUTO_ADDR_LIST"))
00812         cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", 
00813                        "Please define environment variable 'EPICS_CA_AUTO_ADDR_LIST'");
00814       if (!getenv("EPICS_CA_ADDR_LIST"))
00815         cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", 
00816                        "Please define environment variable 'EPICS_CA_ADDR_LIST'");
00817       if (!getenv("EPICS_CA_SERVER_PORT"))
00818         cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", 
00819                        "Please define environment variable 'EPICS_CA_SERVER_PORT'");
00820       return FE_ERR_HW;
00821    } else {
00822      cm_msg(MLOG,"","EPICS_CA_AUTO_ADDR_LIST is %s",getenv("EPICS_CA_AUTO_ADDR_LIST"));
00823      cm_msg(MLOG,"","EPICS_CA_ADDR_LIST is %s",     getenv("EPICS_CA_ADDR_LIST"));
00824      cm_msg(MLOG,"","EPICS_CA_SERVER_PORT is %s",   getenv("EPICS_CA_SERVER_PORT"));
00825    }
00826 
00827    // NIY check if caRepeater program is available 
00828 
00829    info->num_channels = channels;
00830 
00831    /* initially disable all commands */
00832    info->cmd_disabled = 1;
00833 
00834    /* initialize EPICS CA driver */
00835    status = ca_context_create(ca_disable_preemptive_callback);
00836    if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL)) {
00837       cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "Unable to initialize! ca_context_create() "
00838                      "returned status 0X%x = \"%s\"",status,ca_message(status));
00839       return FE_ERR_HW;
00840    }
00841 
00842    status = ca_add_exception_event(epics_ca_exception_handler,0);
00843    if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL)) 
00844       cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "Unable to install global exception handler! "
00845                      "ca_add_exception_handler() returned status 0X%x = \"%s\"",
00846                      status,ca_message(status));
00847 
00848    /* allocate arrays */
00849    info->settings.channel_names = calloc(channels, CHN_NAME_LENGTH);
00850 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
00851    info->settings.dtype         = calloc(channels, DTYPE_LENGTH);
00852    info->settings.dsec          = calloc(channels, DSEC_LENGTH);
00853 #endif
00854    info->settings.chnflags      = calloc(channels, CHNFLAGS_LENGTH);
00855    info->settings.minval        = calloc(channels, sizeof(float));
00856    info->settings.maxval        = calloc(channels, sizeof(float));
00857    info->settings.tolerance     = calloc(channels, sizeof(float));
00858    info->settings.used          = calloc(channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00859    info->settings.readonly      = calloc(channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00860 
00861    info->array         = calloc(channels, sizeof(float));
00862    info->array_m       = calloc(channels, sizeof(float));
00863    info->demand        = calloc(channels, sizeof(float));
00864    info->threshold     = NULL;
00865    info->lastset       = calloc(channels, sizeof(DWORD));
00866    info->lastget       = calloc(channels, sizeof(DWORD));
00867    info->status        = calloc(channels, sizeof(int));
00868    info->pchid         = calloc(channels, sizeof(chid));
00869    info->found         = calloc(channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00870    info->iscmd         = calloc(channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00871    info->subscribed    = calloc(channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00872    info->down          = calloc(channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00873    info->firstread     = calloc(channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00874    info->nerr          = calloc(channels, sizeof(INT));
00875    info->nmsg          = calloc(channels, sizeof(INT));
00876    info->tolchan       = calloc(channels, sizeof(INT));
00877    info->gchan         = calloc(channels, sizeof(INT));
00878    info->intol         = calloc(channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00879 
00880    /* init arrays */
00881    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
00882        sprintf(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i, "NONE_%d", i);
00883 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
00884        sprintf(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i,            "**TYPE_NOT_INIT**");
00885        sprintf(info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i,              "**SEC_NOT_INIT**");
00886 #endif
00887        sprintf(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,      "US");
00888        *(info->settings.minval+i)   = 0.f;
00889        *(info->settings.maxval+i)   = 0.f;
00890        *(info->settings.tolerance+i)= 0.f;
00891    /*  *(info->settings.used+i)     = FALSE;    already init'd */
00892        *(info->settings.readonly+i) = TRUE;
00893 
00894        *(info->array+i)      = -2.f;
00895        *(info->array_m+i)    = -2.f;
00896        *(info->demand+i)     = -2.f;
00897     /* *(info->found+i)      = FALSE; already init'd */
00898     /* *(info->iscmd+i)      = FALSE; already init'd */
00899     /* *(info->subscribed+i) = FALSE; already init'd */
00900        *(info->down+i)       = TRUE;
00901     /* *(info->firstread+i)  = FALSE; already init'd */
00902     /* *(info->nerr+i)       = 0;     already init'd */
00903     /* *(info->nmsg+i)       = 0;     already init'd */
00904        *(info->tolchan+i)    = -1;
00905        *(info->gchan+i)      = -1;
00906        *(info->intol+i)      = TRUE;
00907     /* *(info->pchid+i)      = 0;     already init'd */
00908        *(info->lastset+i)    = ss_time();
00909     /* *(info->lastget+i)    = 0;     already init'd */
00910        *(info->status+i)     = ECA_NORMAL;
00911    }
00912 
00913    // remember if DD/Loadfile is already present
00914    status = db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "DD/Loadfile", &subkey);
00915 
00916    strcpy(info->settings.loadfile,"NONE");
00917    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Loadfile", info->settings.loadfile, 
00918                             NAME_LENGTH, 1, TID_STRING);
00919    // DD/Loadfile was not in ODB -> stop here user may now set loadfile name
00920    if (status == DB_NO_KEY) {
00921      cm_msg(MLOG,"","Created \"DD/Loadfile\" in ODB -> set name of loadfile and restart"
00922                     " to load initial setup from local loadfile");
00923      cm_msg(MLOG,"","Or just restart and do manual setup in ODB");
00924      return FE_ERR_HW;
00925    }
00926 
00927    info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected = 0;
00928    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Sum_NOT_Connected", 
00929                  &info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected, sizeof(int), 1, TID_INT);
00930    status = db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "DD/Sum_NOT_Connected", &info->hkeySNC);
00931    if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
00932      if (info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected != 0) {
00933        info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected = 0;
00934        db_set_data(hDB, info->hkeySNC, &info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected, 
00935                      sizeof(int), 1, TID_INT);
00936      }
00937    } else {
00938      info->hkeySNC = 0;
00939    }
00940 
00941    info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance = 0;
00942    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance", 
00943                  &info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance, sizeof(int), 1, TID_INT);
00944    status = db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "DD/Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance", &info->hkeySNT);
00945    if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
00946      if (info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance != 0) {
00947        info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance = 0;
00948        db_set_data(hDB,info->hkeySNT,&info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance,
00949                    sizeof(int),1,TID_INT);
00950      }
00951    } else {
00952      info->hkeySNT = 0;
00953    }
00954 
00955    strcpy(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTConnected,"NONE");
00956    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/AlarmWhenNOTConnected", 
00957                  info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTConnected, NAME_LENGTH, 1, TID_STRING);
00958 
00959    strcpy(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTinTolerance,"NONE");
00960    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/AlarmWhenNOTinTolerance", 
00961                  info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTinTolerance, NAME_LENGTH, 1, TID_STRING);
00962 
00963    // read info about EPICS Channel Name, Used, Readonly, Chn flags, Name, Min, Max, 
00964    // Threshold from a local file and write to DD if not created yet
00965    if (strcmp(info->settings.loadfile,"NONE") != 0){
00966 
00967      if (db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "DD/EPICS Channel name", &subkey) == DB_NO_KEY) {
00968        FILE *stream;
00969 
00970        i = 0;
00971        if ((stream = fopen(info->settings.loadfile,"r")) != NULL) {
00972          char tline[255];
00973          char *p,*pn,*po;
00974          int  n,k;
00975 
00976          pnames =      calloc(channels, NAME_LENGTH);
00977          info->threshold = calloc(channels, sizeof(float));
00978          n = 0;
00979          while (!feof(stream)) {
00980            //             1   2   3     4         5   6   7         8
00981            // EPICSCAname[,Y/N,Y/N,flags,MidasName,Min,Max,Threshold,Toler] # comments
00982            if (fgets(tline, sizeof(tline), stream) != NULL) {
00983              n++;
00984              if ((p = strchr(tline,'#'))) *p = '\0';  // remove comments
00985 
00986              if (strlen(tline) > 0) { // make sure last field on line ends with ,
00987                int j;
00988                for (j=strlen(tline)-1; j >= 0; j--) {
00989                  if (!isspace(tline[j])) { // remove trailing blanks
00990                    if (tline[j] != ',') {tline[j+1] = ','; tline[j+2] = '\0';}
00991                    break;
00992                  }
00993                }
00994              }
00995              if ((strlen(tline) > 0)&&(p = strchr(tline,','))) { // EPICS channel name
00996                if (i < channels) {
00997                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d: Processing Line %d: %s", i, n, tline);
00998                  pn = p+1; *p = '\0';
00999                  po = &tline[0];
01000 
01001                  for (k=strlen(po)-1; k >= 0; k--) // remove trailing blanks
01002                    if (isspace(*(po+k))) *(po+k)='\0'; else break;
01003                  while (isspace(*po)) po++;        // remove leading blanks
01004 
01005                  if (strlen(po) >= CHN_NAME_LENGTH) *(po+CHN_NAME_LENGTH-1) = '\0'; 
01006 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01007                  // NIY check GFA convention ?
01008 #endif
01009                  strcpy(info->settings.channel_names+ CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,po);
01010 
01011                  // take EPICS Channel as Midas Name default (maybe overwritten below)
01012                  if (strlen(po) >= NAME_LENGTH) *(po+NAME_LENGTH-1) = '\0'; 
01013                  strcpy(pnames+NAME_LENGTH*i,po);
01014 
01015                  if (info->threshold) *(info->threshold+i) = 0.1f; 
01016                
01017                  if (p = strchr(pn,',')) {  // used 
01018                    po = pn; pn = p+1; *p = '\0';
01019                    if (strchr(po,'y')||strchr(po,'Y')) *(info->settings.used+i) = TRUE;
01020 
01021                    if (p = strchr(pn,',')) { // readonly
01022                      po = pn; pn = p+1; *p = '\0';
01023                      if (strchr(po,'n')||strchr(po,'N')) 
01024                        *(info->settings.readonly+i)=FALSE;
01025 
01026                      if (p = strchr(pn,',')) { // channel flags
01027                        po = pn; pn = p+1; *p = '\0'; 
01028                        for (k=strlen(po)-1; k >= 0; k--) // remove trailing blanks
01029                          if (isspace(*(po+k))) *(po+k)='\0'; else break;
01030                        if (strlen(po) >= CHNFLAGS_LENGTH) *(po+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH-1) = '\0';
01031                        if (strlen(po) > 0) {
01032                          int k1;
01033                          
01034                          // remove blanks
01035                          for (k=0, k1=0; k < strlen(po); k++) {
01036                            *(info->settings.chnflags+ CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i+k) = '\0';
01037                            if (!isspace(*(po+k))) {
01038 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01039                              // NIY check flags also with/without GFA_SPECIFIC
01040                              // NIY T should only be set for SOL, IST or POSA
01041 #else
01042 #endif
01043                              // NIY R should only be set for :SOL: or maybe :COM:
01044                              *(info->settings.chnflags+ CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i+k1) = *(po+k);
01045                              k1++;
01046                              *(info->settings.chnflags+ CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i+k1) = '\0';
01047                            }
01048                          }
01049                        }
01050 
01051                        if ((p = strchr(pn,','))) { // Midas Name
01052                          po = pn; pn = p+1; *p = '\0';
01053                          for (k=strlen(po)-1; k >= 0; k--) // remove trailing blanks
01054                            if (isspace(*(po+k))) *(po+k)='\0'; else break;
01055                          while (isspace(*po)) po++;        // remove leading blanks
01056                          if (strlen(po) >= NAME_LENGTH) *(po+NAME_LENGTH-1) = '\0';
01057                          if (strlen(po) > 0) {
01058                            strcpy(pnames+NAME_LENGTH*i,po);
01059                          }
01060 
01061                          if ((p = strchr(pn,','))) { // Minval
01062                            po = pn; pn = p+1; *p = '\0';
01063                            for (k=strlen(po)-1; k >= 0; k--) // remove trailing blanks
01064                              if (isspace(*(po+k))) *(po+k)='\0'; else break;
01065                            if (strlen(po) > 0) {
01066                              float tval;
01067                              if (sscanf(po,"%f",&tval) == 1) 
01068                                *(info->settings.minval+i) = tval;
01069                            }
01070 
01071                            if ((p = strchr(pn,','))) { // Maxval
01072                              po = pn; pn = p+1; *p = '\0';
01073                              for (k=strlen(po)-1; k >= 0; k--) // remove trailing blanks
01074                                if (isspace(*(po+k))) *(po+k)='\0'; else break;
01075                              if (strlen(po) > 0) {
01076                                float tval;
01077                                if (sscanf(po,"%f",&tval) == 1) 
01078                                  *(info->settings.maxval+i) = tval;
01079                              }
01080 
01081                              if ((p = strchr(pn,','))) { // threshold
01082                                po = pn; pn = p+1; *p = '\0';
01083                                for (k=strlen(po)-1; k >= 0; k--)// remove trailing blanks
01084                                  if (isspace(*(po+k))) *(po+k)='\0'; else break;
01085                                if (strlen(po) > 0) {
01086                                  float tval;
01087                                  if ((sscanf(po,"%f",&tval) == 1) && info->threshold) 
01088                                    *(info->threshold+i) = tval;
01089                                }
01090 
01091                                for (k=strlen(pn)-1; k >= 0; k--)// remove trailing blanks
01092                                  if (isspace(*(pn+k))) *(pn+k)='\0'; else break;
01093                                if (strlen(pn) > 0) {   // rest is tolerance
01094                                  float tval;
01095                                  if (sscanf(pn,"%f",&tval) == 1) 
01096                                    *(info->settings.tolerance+i) = tval;
01097                                }
01098                              }
01099                            }
01100                          }
01101                        }
01102                      }
01103                    }
01104                  }
01105                  // NIY check min < max
01106                  // NIY check threshold > 0
01107 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01108                  // NIY check tolerance >= 0 when T flag
01109 #endif
01110                } else {
01111                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","Line %d not handled! %s", n, tline);
01112                }
01113                i++;
01114              }
01115            } 
01116          } // while not EOF 
01117 
01118          if (i < channels) {
01119            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Less channels (%d) loaded from %s than expected (%d) " 
01120                           "-> recompile with %d or add more channel lines", i, 
01121                           info->settings.loadfile, channels, i);
01122            for (; i < channels; i++) { // init rest to defaults
01123              sprintf(pnames+NAME_LENGTH*i,"NONE_%d",i);
01124              if (info->threshold) *(info->threshold+i) = 0.1f; 
01125            } 
01126          } else if (i > channels) {
01127            cm_msg(MLOG,"","More channels (%d) read from %s than expected (%d) " 
01128                           "-> recompile with %d or remove channel lines", i, 
01129                           info->settings.loadfile, channels, i);
01130          } else {
01131            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Expected number of channels (%d) read ", channels);
01132          }
01133          if (i > 0) loaded = TRUE; 
01134          fclose(stream);
01135        } else {
01136          cm_msg(MLOG,"","ERROR %d returned when trying to open %s for read access!",
01137                         errno, info->settings.loadfile);
01138        }
01139      }
01140    } 
01141   
01142    /* init or get channel names, Used and Readonly DD settings */
01143    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/EPICS Channel name", info->settings.channel_names, 
01144                             CHN_NAME_LENGTH * channels, channels, TID_STRING);
01145    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Used", info->settings.used, 
01146                             sizeof(BOOL)* channels, channels, TID_BOOL);
01147    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Readonly", info->settings.readonly, 
01148                             sizeof(BOOL)* channels, channels, TID_BOOL);
01149    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Chn_Flags", info->settings.chnflags, 
01150                             CHNFLAGS_LENGTH * channels, channels, TID_STRING);
01151 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01152    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/DESC:TYP", info->settings.dtype, 
01153                             DTYPE_LENGTH * channels, channels, TID_STRING);
01154    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/DESC:SEC", info->settings.dsec, 
01155                             DSEC_LENGTH * channels, channels, TID_STRING);
01156 #endif
01157    if (loaded) { // min and max were loaded write them now
01158      db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Minval", info->settings.minval, 
01159                               sizeof(float)* channels, channels, TID_FLOAT);
01160      db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Maxval", info->settings.maxval, 
01161                               sizeof(float)* channels, channels, TID_FLOAT);
01162    }
01163 
01164    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Tolerance", info->settings.tolerance, 
01165                             sizeof(float)* channels, channels, TID_FLOAT);
01166 
01167    /* -- search for channels */
01168 
01169 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01170    /* search for <gfa_device>:DESC:TYP and <gfa_device>:DESC:SEC  to 
01171     * get device type and section of channel */
01172    {
01173      chid *tchidt;
01174      chid *tchids;
01175      char tname[2*CHN_NAME_LENGTH]; 
01176      HNDLE tkey;
01177 
01178      tchidt = calloc(channels, sizeof(chid));
01179      tchids = calloc(channels, sizeof(chid));
01180 
01181      if (tchidt && tchids) {
01182        /* post channel search to IO buffer */
01183        for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01184          if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01185            char *tpos;
01186 
01187            strcpy(tname,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
01188            tpos = strchr(tname,':');
01189            /*
01190             * GFA specific: devices of the same type have the same channel names
01191             * channel name is <gfa_device_name>:<gfa_device_specific_channel_info>
01192             * e.g.: BMB1:COM:2   to set/read demand  or BMB1:STA:1 to read status
01193             *       <gfa_device>:DESC:TYP contains info about GFA device type
01194             *       <gfa_device>:DESC:SEC contains info about GFA device section
01195             */
01196            if (tpos) *tpos = '\0';
01197            strcat(tname,":DESC:TYP");           
01198            status = ca_create_channel(tname,NULL,NULL,0,tchidt+i);
01199            if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL))
01200              cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "ERROR status 0X%x = \"%s\" returned by "
01201                "ca_create_channel(%s)", status, ca_message(status), tname);
01202          }
01203        }
01204 
01205        for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01206          if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01207            char *tpos;
01208 
01209            strcpy(tname,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
01210            tpos = strchr(tname,':');
01211            if (tpos) *tpos = '\0';
01212            strcat(tname,":DESC:SEC");           
01213            status = ca_create_channel(tname,NULL,NULL,0,tchids+i);
01214            if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL))
01215              cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "ERROR status 0X%x = \"%s\" returned by "
01216                "ca_create_channel(%s)", status, ca_message(status), tname);
01217          }
01218        }
01219 
01220        /* flush send buffer and block for outstanding queries */
01221        status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01222        if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01223        if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01224 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01225        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(5.0) status 0X%x = \"%s\"",status,ca_message(status));
01226 #endif
01227        /* if channel is connected post get channel info to IO buffer */
01228        for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01229          if (*(info->settings.used+i)) { 
01230            strcpy(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i, "**TYPE_NOT_RETURNED**");
01231            if (ca_state(*(tchidt+i)) == cs_conn) {
01232              status = ca_get(DBR_STRING,*(tchidt+i),info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i);
01233              if (status != ECA_NORMAL)
01234                cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_get(dtype of channel %d): status 0X%x = \"%s\"",i,
01235                               status,ca_message(status));
01236            } else {
01237              strcpy(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i, "**TYPE_NOT_FOUND**");
01238            }
01239          } else {
01240            strcpy(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i, "**CHAN_NOT_USED**");
01241          }
01242        }
01243 
01244        for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01245          if (*(info->settings.used+i)) { 
01246            strcpy(info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i, "**SEC_NOT_RETURNED**");
01247            if (ca_state(*(tchids+i)) == cs_conn) {
01248              status = ca_get(DBR_STRING,*(tchids+i),info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i);
01249              if (status != ECA_NORMAL)
01250                cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_get(dsec of channel %d): status 0X%x = \"%s\"",i,
01251                               status,ca_message(status));
01252            } else {
01253              strcpy(info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i, "**SEC_NOT_FOUND**");
01254            }
01255          } else {
01256            strcpy(info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i, "**CHAN_NOT_USED**");
01257          }
01258        }
01259        status = ca_pend_io(1.0);  /* flush buffer and block for outstanding q's */
01260        if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(1.0);
01261 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01262        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(1.0) status 0X%x = \"%s\"",status,ca_message(status));
01263 #endif
01264        /* NOTE: status is not evaluated */
01265 
01266 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
01267        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ss_sleep(2000)");
01268 #endif
01269        ss_sleep(2000);            /* wait some time */
01270 
01271        status = ca_pend_event(1.0);  /* probably not necessary to wait again */   
01272 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01273        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_event(1.0)");
01274 #endif
01275 
01276        // (re)set info when not connected then release channels
01277        for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01278          if (*(tchidt+i)) {
01279            if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01280              if (ca_state(*(tchidt+i)) != cs_conn) {
01281                // some beamline channel locks (KanalverschlusS) are not fully
01282                // implemented in EPICS therefore supply TYP information from chan name
01283                if (strncmp(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,"KS",2)==0)
01284                  strcpy(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i, "BX");
01285                // separator HV and spinrotator HV are from another server
01286                else if ((strncmp(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,"SEP",3) 
01287                    ==0) && 
01288                   (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,"HVN:") ||
01289                    strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,"HVP:") ||
01290                    strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,"HV:")))
01291                  strcpy(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i, "HVPS");
01292                else
01293                  strcpy(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i, "**TYPE_NOT_FOUND**");
01294              }
01295            } 
01296            status = ca_clear_channel(*(tchidt+i));
01297            if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL))
01298              cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", ":DESC:TYP of Channel %d(%s): "
01299                             "ca_clear_channel() returned status 0X%x = \"%s\"",i,
01300                             info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01301                             status, ca_message(status));
01302          }
01303        }
01304        for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01305          if (*(tchids+i)) {
01306            if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01307              if (ca_state(*(tchids+i)) != cs_conn) {
01308                // spinrotator/separator HV is not fully implemented
01309                // in EPICS therefore supply SEC information from channel name
01310                if (strncmp(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,"sep31:",6)==0)
01311                  strcpy(info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i, "PIM31");
01312                else
01313                  strcpy(info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i, "**SEC_NOT_FOUND**");
01314              }
01315            }
01316            status = ca_clear_channel(*(tchids+i));
01317            if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL))
01318              cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", ":DESC:SEC of Channel %d(%s): "
01319                             "ca_clear_channel() returned status 0X%x = \"%s\"",i,
01320                             info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01321                             status, ca_message(status));
01322          }
01323        }
01324        status = ca_pend_io(1.0); /* flush buffer */
01325        if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(1.0);
01326 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01327        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(1.0) status 0X%x = \"%s\"",status,ca_message(status));
01328 #endif
01329 
01330      }
01331 
01332      if (tchidt)  free(tchidt);
01333      if (tchids)  free(tchids);
01334 
01335      /* update ODB */
01336      status = db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "DD/DESC:TYP", &tkey);
01337      if (status == DB_SUCCESS) 
01338        db_set_data(hDB, tkey, info->settings.dtype, DTYPE_LENGTH * channels, 
01339                    channels, TID_STRING);
01340 
01341      status = db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "DD/DESC:SEC", &tkey);
01342      if (status == DB_SUCCESS) 
01343        db_set_data(hDB, tkey, info->settings.dsec, DSEC_LENGTH * channels, 
01344                    channels, TID_STRING);
01345 
01346    }
01347 #endif /* #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC */
01348 
01349    /* disable event handler callback subscription in the connection handler callback
01350     * before everything is set-up */
01351    info->subscribe_disabled = TRUE;
01352  
01353    /* post create channel connection to IO buffer */
01354    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01355      if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01356         /* NOTE: connection handler used -> ca_pend_io() will not block - waiting for 
01357          *       channel to enter connected state */               
01358         status = ca_create_channel(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01359                                    epics_ca_connection_handler, info, 0, info->pchid+i);
01360         if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL))
01361            cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "ERROR status 0X%x = \"%s\" returned by "
01362                           "ca_create_channel(%s)", status, ca_message(status),
01363                           info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
01364      }
01365    }
01366 
01367    /* flush send buffer */
01368    status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01369    if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01370    if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01371    if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01372    if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01373 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01374    cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(5.0) status 0X%x = \"%s\"", status, ca_message(status));
01375 #endif
01376 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
01377    cm_msg(MLOG,"","ss_sleep(5000)");
01378 #endif
01379    ss_sleep(5000);
01380    ca_pend_event(4.0);
01381 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01382    cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_event(4.0)");
01383 #endif
01384 
01385    /* timeout occured or normal (ca_pend_io,only) -> process channels */
01386    if ((status == ECA_TIMEOUT) || (status == ECA_NORMAL)){
01387 
01388      for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01389        if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01390          if ((castate=ca_state(*(info->pchid+i))) != cs_conn) {
01391            cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "Not connected to EPICS Channel %d(%s). "
01392                                            "Channel state is %d = \"%s\"",i, 
01393                                       info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i, 
01394                                            castate, castatestr(castate));
01395          } else {
01396            if (!*(info->found+i)) {
01397              cm_msg(MLOG, "epics_ca_init", "Connected to EPICS Channel %d(%s)", i,
01398                                          info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
01399              *(info->found+i) = TRUE;
01400            }
01401          }
01402        }
01403      }
01404 
01405    } else {
01406      cm_msg(MLOG,"epics_ca_init","Returned status %d = \"%s\" of ca_pend_io(A) is not "
01407                                  "handled", status, ca_message(status));
01408    }
01409 
01410    // get MIN/MAX if not already present 
01411    // NOTE: some channels may still be missing 
01412                              status = db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "DD/Minval", &subkey);
01413    if (status !=  DB_NO_KEY) status = db_find_key(hDB, hKey, "DD/Maxval", &subkey);
01414 
01415    if (status == DB_NO_KEY) {
01416      struct dbr_ctrl_float *pctrl;
01417 
01418      cm_msg(MLOG,"","Query LOW and HIGH of channels");
01419      pctrl = calloc(channels,sizeof(struct dbr_ctrl_float));
01420      if (pctrl) {
01421        int nchans;
01422        for (nchans = 0, i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01423          if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01424            if ((castate=ca_state(*(info->pchid+i))) == cs_conn) {
01425              if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'U') == NULL) {
01426                if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'S') == NULL) {
01427                  if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'M') != NULL) {
01428                    status = ca_get(DBR_CTRL_FLOAT,*(info->pchid+i),pctrl+i);
01429                    if (status != ECA_NORMAL)
01430                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_get(DBR_CTRL_FLOAT of channel %d): "
01431                                     "status 0X%x = \"%s\"",i,status,ca_message(status));
01432                    nchans++;
01433                  } else {
01434                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d M flag not set", i);
01435                  }
01436                } else {
01437                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d S flag set", i);
01438                }
01439              } else {
01440                cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d U flag set", i);
01441              }
01442            } else {
01443              cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d not connected", i);
01444            }
01445          } else {
01446            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d not used", i);
01447          }
01448        }
01449 
01450        if (nchans>0) {
01451          cm_msg(MLOG,"","Queried LOW and HIGH of %d channels",nchans);
01452          /* flush send buffer */
01453          status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01454          if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01455          if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01456 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01457          cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(5.0) status 0X%x =\"%s\"",status,ca_message(status));
01458 #endif
01459 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
01460          cm_msg(MLOG,"","ss_sleep(1000)");
01461 #endif
01462          ss_sleep(1000);
01463          ca_pend_event(4.0);
01464 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01465          cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_event(1.0)");
01466 #endif
01467          for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01468            if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01469              if ((castate=ca_state(*(info->pchid+i))) == cs_conn) {
01470                if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'U') == NULL) {
01471                  if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'S') == NULL) {
01472                    if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'M') != NULL) {
01473                      *(info->settings.minval+i) = (pctrl+i)->lower_ctrl_limit;
01474                       cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): LOW is %f",
01475                           i,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01476                           *(info->settings.minval+i)); 
01477                      *(info->settings.maxval+i) = (pctrl+i)->upper_ctrl_limit; 
01478                       cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): HIGH is %f",
01479                           i,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01480                           *(info->settings.maxval+i)); 
01481                    }
01482                  }
01483                }
01484              }
01485            }
01486          }
01487        }
01488        free(pctrl);
01489      } else {
01490        cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_init","Memory not allocated for struct dbr_ctrl_float");
01491      }
01492    }
01493 
01494    /* create and init or read DD/Minval DD/Maxval */
01495    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Minval", info->settings.minval, 
01496                             sizeof(float)* channels, channels, TID_FLOAT);
01497    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "DD/Maxval", info->settings.maxval, 
01498                             sizeof(float)* channels, channels, TID_FLOAT);
01499 
01500    /* enable event handler callback subscription in connection handler */
01501    info->subscribe_disabled = FALSE;
01502 
01503    /* buffer add change notifications */
01504    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01505      /* only for connected channels */
01506      if (*(info->settings.used+i) && ((castate=ca_state(info->pchid[i])) == cs_conn)) {
01507        // chan specific: omit channels with S-flag e.g.: returning strings
01508        //                and :COM:2 channels
01509        if ((strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'S') == NULL) &&
01510            (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,":COM:2") == NULL)){
01511          // subscribe event handler callback for this channel converting value to float
01512          status = ca_create_subscription(DBR_FLOAT, 1, *(info->pchid+i), DBE_VALUE, 
01513                                          epics_ca_event_handler, info, NULL);
01514          if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL)) {
01515            cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_init","Channel %d(%s): ca_create_subscription() retur"
01516              "ned status 0x%X = \"%s\"",i,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01517              status, ca_message(status));
01518          } else {
01519 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
01520            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): CA event handler (float) will be installed",
01521                           i,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i); 
01522 #endif
01523            *(info->subscribed+i) = TRUE;
01524          }
01525        } else {
01526          if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'S'))
01527            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): S flag: CA event handler will NOT be "
01528              "installed", i,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i); 
01529 #ifdef MIDEBUG
01530          else if (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,":COM:2"))
01531            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): COM Channel : CA event handler will NOT "
01532              "be installed",i,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i); 
01533 #endif
01534          *(info->subscribed+i) = TRUE; // mark as handled
01535        }
01536      //if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'C') != NULL)
01537          *(info->down+i) = FALSE;  // channel is currently up
01538      } else {
01539      //if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'C') != NULL)
01540          *(info->down+i) = TRUE;  // channel is currently down
01541      }
01542    }
01543 
01544    /* flush send buffer and block for outstanding queries */
01545    status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01546    if (status == ECA_TIMEOUT) status = ca_pend_io(5.0);
01547 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01548    cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(5.0) status 0X%x = \"%s\"", status, ca_message(status));
01549 #endif
01550 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
01551    cm_msg(MLOG,"","ss_sleep(2000)");
01552 #endif
01553    ss_sleep(2000);  // wait fixed time interval for (initial) events
01554 
01555    status = ca_pend_event(5.0);  // process receive buffer to handle events
01556 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01557    cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_event(5.0)");
01558 #endif
01559    if ((status == ECA_TIMEOUT) || (status == ECA_NORMAL)) {
01560       for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01561         if (*(info->settings.used+i) && *(info->found+i)) {
01562           if (ca_state(info->pchid[i]) != cs_conn)
01563              cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "Not connected to %s",
01564                                      info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
01565         } else if (*(info->found+i)){
01566           if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01567             cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): Not connected (state %d = \"%s\") -> no CA "
01568                            "callback installed and channel disabled", i,
01569                            info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i, castate, 
01570                            castatestr(castate));
01571           }
01572           *(info->found+i) = FALSE;
01573         }
01574       }
01575    } else if (status != ECA_NORMAL) {
01576 #ifdef MIDEBUG
01577      cm_msg(MLOG,"epics_ca_init","Returned status %d \"%s\" of ca_pend_io(B) is not "
01578                                  "handled", status, ca_message(status));
01579 #endif
01580    }
01581 
01582    /* log information */
01583    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
01584      if (*(info->settings.used+i)) {
01585          // R only for :COM: or :SOL: 
01586 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01587        if (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,":COM:") ||
01588            strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,":SOL:"))
01589          sprintf(smsg,"Channel %d(%s): %s Type: %s Section: %s Chn_Flags: %s", i,
01590                       info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i, 
01591                       *(info->settings.readonly+i)?"R":"W",
01592                       info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH *i,
01593                       info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i,
01594                       info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i);
01595        else
01596          sprintf(smsg,"Channel %d(%s): R Type: %s Section: %s Chn_Flags: %s", i,
01597                       info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i, 
01598                       info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH *i,
01599                       info->settings.dsec+DSEC_LENGTH*i,
01600                       info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i);
01601 #else
01602        sprintf(smsg,"Channel %d(%s): %s Chn_Flags: %s", i,
01603                     info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01604                     *(info->readonly+i)?"R":"W",
01605                     info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i);
01606 #endif /* #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC */
01607 
01608        if ((strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'U'))||
01609            (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'S'))) {
01610          if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'I')||
01611              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'F')||
01612              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'M')||
01613              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'C')||
01614 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01615              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'P')||
01616              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'N')||
01617              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'Z')||
01618              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'V')||
01619              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'T')||
01620              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'G')||
01621 #endif
01622              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'R')  ) 
01623            strcat(smsg," ** Other flag(s) overruled by U and/or S **");
01624        } else {
01625          if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'M')) {
01626            sprintf(&smsg[strlen(smsg)]," Minval = %.2f, Maxval = %.2f",
01627                    *(info->settings.minval+i), *(info->settings.maxval+i));
01628          }
01629 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01630          // NIY check and list additional info (tolerance when T, 
01631          if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'T')) {
01632            if ( *(info->settings.tolerance+i) >= 0.f) 
01633              sprintf(&smsg[strlen(smsg)]," Tolerance = %f",
01634                                          *(info->settings.tolerance+i));
01635          }
01636 #endif
01637        }
01638        cm_msg(MLOG,"",smsg);
01639      } else {
01640        sprintf(smsg,"Channel %d(%s): NOT Used", i,
01641                       info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
01642        cm_msg(MLOG,"",smsg);
01643      }
01644    }
01645 
01646 #ifndef OMIT_ODBUPDATE
01647    // get equipment name
01648    if ((status = db_get_path(hDB, hKey, tpath, sizeof(tpath))) == DB_SUCCESS) {
01649      int i;
01650      for (i = strlen("/Equipment/"); i < strlen(tpath); i++) {
01651        if (tpath[i] == '/') {
01652          tpath[i] = '\0';
01653          strncpy(info->name, &tpath[strlen("/Equipment/")], NAME_LENGTH);
01654          info->name[NAME_LENGTH - 1] = '\0';
01655          sprintf(tpath, "/Equipment/%s/Variables/Demand",info->name);
01656          status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, tpath, &info->hkeyDemand);
01657          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) info->hkeyDemand = 0;
01658          break;
01659        }
01660      }
01661      cm_msg(MINFO, "", "epics_ca_init: Equipment name is %s", info->name);
01662    } else {
01663      cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init","ERROR %d getting key path", status);
01664    }
01665 #else 
01666    info->hkeyDemand = 0;
01667 #endif
01668 
01669 #ifndef OMIT_ODBUPDATE
01670    // directly init ODB settings of Names
01671    if (pnames != NULL) {
01672      sprintf(tpath, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/Names",info->name);
01673      db_merge_data(hDB, 0, tpath, pnames, NAME_LENGTH*channels, channels, TID_STRING);
01674      free(pnames);
01675      pnames = NULL;
01676    }
01677 #endif
01678 
01679 #ifndef OMIT_ODBUPDATE
01680    // directly init ODB settings of thresholds
01681    if (info->threshold != NULL) {
01682      // NIY TODO does not work
01683      //sprintf(tpath, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/Update Threshold Measured",info->name);
01684      //db_merge_data(hDB, 0, tpath, info->threshold, sizeof(float)* channels, channels, 
01685      //              TID_FLOAT);
01686      //free(info->threshold);
01687      //info->threshold = NULL;
01688    }
01689 #endif
01690 
01691 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01692 
01693   /* list GFA types, their channels, channel masks, values and corresp. messages */
01694 #ifdef MIDEBUG
01695   cm_msg(MLOG, "", "List of used GFA types");
01696 
01697   for (i=0; i < N_GFA_TYPES; i++) {
01698     int  n,j;
01699     BOOL found;    
01700     GFA_channel *tc;
01701 
01702     for (found=FALSE,n=0; n < info->num_channels; n++) {
01703       if (strcmp(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*n,gfatype[i].type) == 0) {
01704         found = TRUE;
01705         break;
01706       }
01707     }
01708 
01709     if (!found) continue;
01710 
01711     cm_msg(MLOG,"","TYPE: \"%s\"  \"%s\"  %d channels", gfatype[i].type, gfatype[i].desc,
01712                                                         gfatype[i].nc);
01713     tc = gfatype[i].tc;
01714 
01715     for (j = 0; j < gfatype[i].nc; j++) {
01716       int k;
01717       GFA_mask *cm;
01718       
01719       if (!(tc+j)) continue;
01720 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
01721       cm_msg(MLOG,"","**Channel \"%s\" \"%s\" %d masks",(tc+j)->spec,(tc+j)->desc,
01722                                                       (tc+j)->ns); 
01723 #else
01724       cm_msg(MLOG,"","**Channel \"%s\" \"%s\"",(tc+j)->spec,(tc+j)->desc); 
01725 #endif
01726       cm = (tc+j)->cm;
01727       for (k = 0; k < (tc+j)->ns; k++) {
01728         int l;
01729         GFA_msg      *sm;
01730 
01731         if (!(cm+k)) continue;
01732         cm_msg(MLOG,"","****Mask 0x%4.4X",(cm+k)->mask);
01733         sm = (cm+k)->sm;
01734         for (l = 0; l < (cm+k)->nm; l++) {
01735           if (!(sm+l)) continue;
01736           cm_msg(MLOG,"","******Value 0x%4.4X : \"%s\"",(sm+l)->value, (sm+l)->msg);
01737         }
01738         
01739       }
01740     }
01741   }
01742 #endif
01743 
01744   // check if GFA type is in list and channel is known
01745   //     when not write message NO GFA specific handling possible for TYP
01746   for (i=0; i < info->num_channels; i++) {
01747     int  n;
01748     BOOL found;    
01749     for (found=FALSE,n=0; n < N_GFA_TYPES; n++) {
01750       if (strcmp(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i,gfatype[n].type) == 0) {
01751         found = TRUE;
01752         break;
01753       }
01754     }
01755 
01756     if (found) {
01757         int m;
01758         char *tpos;
01759 
01760         tpos = strchr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,':');
01761         if (tpos) {
01762           for (found = FALSE, m=0; m < gfatype[n].nc; m++) { //loop over channels of type
01763             if ((gfatype[n].tc+m) && (strcmp((gfatype[n].tc+m)->spec,tpos)==0)) {
01764               found = TRUE;                                 // channel spec found
01765               *(info->iscmd+i) = (gfatype[n].tc+m)->iscmd;  // copy iscmd flag of spec
01766               break;
01767             } 
01768           }
01769           if (!found && (strcmp(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i,"HVPS")==0)) {
01770             for (found = FALSE, m=0; m < gfatype[n].nc; m++) { //loop over chans of type
01771               if ((gfatype[n].tc+m) && 
01772                    strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01773                           (gfatype[n].tc+m)->spec)) {
01774                 found = TRUE;                                 // channel spec found
01775                 *(info->iscmd+i) = (gfatype[n].tc+m)->iscmd;  // copy iscmd flag of spec
01776                 break;
01777               } 
01778             }
01779           }
01780           if (!found) {
01781             cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): Not found in list of handled channels for "
01782                            "GFA type \"%s\"", i, 
01783                            info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01784                            info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i); 
01785             if (!*(info->settings.readonly+i)) // not found but write flag set
01786               *(info->iscmd+i) = TRUE;         // assume command
01787           }
01788         }
01789     } else {
01790       // omit channels with unknown types
01791       if (strncmp(info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i,"**",2) == 0) continue;
01792 
01793       cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s): GFA Type \"%s\" not found in list"
01794                      " of handled GFA types!", i, 
01795                      info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01796                      info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i); 
01797     }
01798   }
01799 #else
01800   for (i=0; i < info->num_channels; i++) {
01801     if (!*(info->settings.readonly+i)) // write flag set -> assume command
01802       *(info->iscmd+i) = TRUE;
01803   }
01804 #endif /* #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC */
01805 
01806   // reset alarms
01807   if (strncmp(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTConnected,"NONE",4) != 0)
01808     al_reset_alarm(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTConnected);
01809 
01810   if (strncmp(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTinTolerance,"NONE",4) != 0)
01811     al_reset_alarm(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTinTolerance);
01812 
01813 
01814   // initialize demand of channel (and array_m) from readout array 
01815   // if iscmd flag is set and not down
01816   // else init mirror array_m from readout array
01817   for (i=0; i < info->num_channels; i++)
01818     if (*(info->iscmd+i) && !*(info->down+i))
01819       epics_ca_get_demand(info, i, info->demand+i);
01820     else
01821       *(info->array_m+i) = *(info->array+i);
01822 
01823    /* got here without error -> enable all commands */
01824    info->cmd_disabled = FALSE;
01825 
01826 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
01827    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_init()");
01828 #endif
01829 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
01830   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_init()\n", ss_time());
01831 #endif
01832    return FE_SUCCESS;
01833 }
01834 
01835 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01836 
01837 INT epics_ca_exit(CA_INFO *info) {
01838   int i, status;
01839 
01840 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
01841   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : ++epics_ca_exit()\n", ss_time());
01842 #endif
01843 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
01844    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_exit()");
01845 #endif
01846 
01847   if (info) {
01848     // NOTE: not necessary to call ca_clear_subscription() 
01849 
01850     // release channels and event subscription
01851     for (i = 0; i < info->num_channels; i++) {
01852       if (*(info->pchid+i)) { 
01853         status = ca_clear_channel(*(info->pchid+i));
01854         if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL))
01855           cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "Channel %d(%s): ca_clear_channel() returned "
01856                          "status 0X%x = \"%s\"",i,
01857                          info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
01858                          status, ca_message(status));
01859       }
01860     }
01861     status = ca_pend_io(1.0);
01862 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01863     cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(1.0) status 0X%x = \"%s\"", status, ca_message(status));
01864 #endif
01865     status = ca_pend_event(1.0);
01866 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
01867     cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_event(1.0)");
01868 #endif
01869   }
01870 
01871   // close channel access 
01872   ca_context_destroy();
01873 
01874   // free arrays
01875   if (info) {
01876     if (info->settings.channel_names) { free(info->settings.channel_names); 
01877                                          info->settings.channel_names = NULL; }
01878 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01879     if (info->settings.dtype)         { free(info->settings.dtype);         
01880                                         info->settings.dtype         = NULL; }
01881     if (info->settings.dsec)          { free(info->settings.dsec);         
01882                                         info->settings.dsec          = NULL; }
01883 #endif
01884     if (info->settings.chnflags)      { free(info->settings.chnflags);     
01885                                         info->settings.chnflags      = NULL; }
01886     if (info->settings.minval)        { free(info->settings.minval);          
01887                                         info->settings.minval        = NULL; }
01888     if (info->settings.maxval)        { free(info->settings.maxval);          
01889                                         info->settings.maxval        = NULL; }
01890     if (info->settings.tolerance)     { free(info->settings.tolerance);       
01891                                         info->settings.tolerance     = NULL; }
01892     if (info->settings.used)          { free(info->settings.used);          
01893                                         info->settings.used          = NULL; }
01894     if (info->settings.readonly)      { free(info->settings.readonly);      
01895                                         info->settings.readonly      = NULL; }
01896 
01897     if (info->pchid)         { free(info->pchid);         info->pchid         = NULL; }
01898     if (info->array)         { free(info->array);         info->array         = NULL; }
01899     if (info->array_m)       { free(info->array_m);       info->array_m       = NULL; }
01900     if (info->demand)        { free(info->demand);        info->demand        = NULL; }
01901     if (info->lastset)       { free(info->lastset);       info->lastset       = NULL; }
01902     if (info->lastget)       { free(info->lastget);       info->lastget       = NULL; }
01903     if (info->status)        { free(info->status);        info->status        = NULL; }
01904     if (info->found)         { free(info->found);         info->found         = NULL; }
01905     if (info->iscmd)         { free(info->iscmd);         info->iscmd         = NULL; }
01906     if (info->subscribed)    { free(info->subscribed);    info->subscribed    = NULL; }
01907     if (info->down)          { free(info->down);          info->down          = NULL; }
01908     if (info->firstread)     { free(info->firstread);     info->firstread     = NULL; }
01909     if (info->nerr)          { free(info->nerr);          info->nerr          = NULL; }
01910     if (info->nmsg)          { free(info->nmsg);          info->nmsg          = NULL; }
01911     if (info->tolchan)       { free(info->tolchan);       info->tolchan       = NULL; }
01912     if (info->gchan)         { free(info->gchan);         info->gchan         = NULL; }
01913     if (info->intol)         { free(info->intol);         info->intol         = NULL; }
01914     if (info->threshold)     { free(info->threshold);     info->threshold     = NULL; }
01915 
01916     free(info);
01917   }
01918 
01919 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
01920   cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_exit()");
01921 #endif
01922 
01923 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
01924   if (fp) {
01925     fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_exit()\n",ss_time());
01926     fclose(fp);
01927     fp = NULL;
01928   }
01929 #endif
01930 
01931   return FE_SUCCESS;
01932 }
01933 
01934 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01935 
01936 INT epics_ca_set(CA_INFO *info, INT channel, float value, BOOL flush,BOOL forced_update){
01937 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
01938   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : ++epics_ca_set(channel=%d(%s), value=%f, flush=%d, force_upd"
01939                   "=%d)\n", ss_time(), channel, 
01940                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel, 
01941                   value, flush, forced_update);
01942 #endif
01943 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
01944   cm_msg(MLOG,"","  ++epics_ca_set(channel=%d, value=%f, flush=%d,force_upd=%d)",
01945                  channel,value,flush,forced_update);
01946 #endif
01947    if (info) {
01948      if (channel < info->num_channels) {
01949        if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'U') == NULL) {
01950          if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'S') == NULL) {
01951            if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'M') != NULL) {
01952              if ((*(info->settings.minval+channel) != 0.f) ||
01953                  (*(info->settings.maxval+channel) != 0.f)) {
