01954                if (*(info->found+channel) && *(info->settings.used+channel) &&
01955                    !*(info->settings.readonly+channel) && *(info->iscmd+channel)) {
01956                  if (value < *(info->settings.minval+channel)) {
01957                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d (%s): New demand value (%f) lower than "
01958                                   "min value (%f)! - Setting min value", channel,
01959                                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
01960                                   value, *(info->settings.minval+channel));
01961                    value = *(info->settings.minval+channel);
01962                    // NOTE: demand in ODB is not (re)set!
01963                  } else if (value > *(info->settings.maxval+channel)) {
01964                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d (%s): New demand value (%f) larger than "
01965                                   "max value (%f)! - Setting max value", channel,
01966                                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
01967                                   value, *(info->settings.maxval+channel));
01968                    value = *(info->settings.maxval+channel);
01969                    // NOTE: demand in ODB is not (re)set!
01970                  }
01971                }
01972              }
01973            }
01974          }
01975        }
01976 
01977        if ((value != *(info->demand+channel))||forced_update) {
01978          if (*(info->found+channel) && *(info->settings.used+channel) &&
01979             !*(info->settings.readonly+channel) && *(info->iscmd+channel)) {
01980            enum channel_state castate;
01981            if ((castate=ca_state(*(info->pchid+channel)))== cs_conn) {
01982              if (ca_write_access(*(info->pchid+channel))) {
01983                int status;
01984 
01985 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
01986                {
01987                  char *tpos;
01988 
01989                  // channel has <device>:<spec>
01990                  if ((tpos=strchr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
01991                                   ':')) != NULL) {
01992                    int j;
01993 
01994                    for (j = 0; j < N_GFA_TYPES; j++) {
01995                      // find type
01996                     if (strcmp(gfatype[j].type,info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*channel)
01997                        ==0){
01998                        GFA_channel *tc;
01999                        int k;
02000 #ifdef MIDEBUGE
02001                        cm_msg(MLOG,"","Found type %s", gfatype[j].type);
02002 #endif
02003                        tc = gfatype[j].tc;
02004                        for (k=0; k < gfatype[j].nc; k++) {  // channels of this type
02005 
02006                          if (!(tc+k)) continue;
02007 
02008                          if (strcmp(tpos,(tc+k)->spec ) == 0) { // matching :<spec>
02009                            int l;
02010                            GFA_mask *cm;
02011 #ifdef MIDEBUGE
02012                            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Found spec %s NS=%d",(tc+k)->spec,(tc+k)->ns);
02013 #endif
02014                            cm = (tc+k)->cm;
02015                            for (l = 0; l < (tc+k)->ns; l++) { // for all masks
02016                              int m;
02017                              int ttval, tdem;
02018                              GFA_msg  *sm;
02019 
02020                              if (!(cm+l)) continue;
02021 #ifdef MIDEBUGE
02022                              cm_msg(MLOG,"","Checking Mask 0x%4.4X",(cm+l)->mask);
02023 #endif
02024                              ttval = (int)value & (cm+l)->mask; 
02025                              tdem  = (int) *(info->demand+channel) & (cm+l)->mask;
02026                              if (*(info->demand+channel) == -2.f) tdem = 0; // hide setup
02027                              if (( ttval != tdem)||(*(info->demand+channel) == -2.f)) {
02028                                char *tpost,*tposa;
02029                                tpost = tposa = NULL;
02030 
02031                                sm = (cm+l)->sm;
02032                                for (m = 0; m < (cm+l)->nm; m++) {
02033                                  if (!(sm+m)) continue;
02034                            //    cm_msg(MLOG,"","check Value 0x%4.4X : \"%s\"",
02035                            //                   (sm+m)->value, (sm+m)->msg);
02036                                  if ((sm+m)->value == ttval) {
02037                                    if (tpost) cm_msg(MLOG,"","New value: %s overwritten"
02038                                                 " by %s", tpost, (sm+m)->msg);
02039                                    tpost = (sm+m)->msg;
02040                                  }
02041                                  if ((sm+m)->value == tdem)  {
02042                                    if (tposa) cm_msg(MLOG,"","Prev value: %s overwritten"
02043                                                 " by %s", tposa, (sm+m)->msg);
02044                                    tposa = (sm+m)->msg;
02045                                  }
02046                                } // for all values
02047 
02048                                if (tpost) {
02049                                  if (*(info->demand+channel) == -2.f) tposa = NULL;//hide
02050                                  if (tposa) {
02051                                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","%s: \"%s\" changed to \"%s\"",
02052                                     info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02053                                      tposa, tpost);
02054                                  } else {
02055                                    if (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+
02056                                                      CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,":COM:")) {
02057 
02058                                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%s: Command is \"%s\"",
02059                                    info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02060                                        tpost);
02061                                    } else {
02062                                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%s: \"%s\" is currently set",
02063                                     info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02064                                        tpost);
02065                                    }
02066                                  }
02067                                // nothing assigned to mask
02068                                } else {
02069                                  if (*(info->demand+channel) != -2.f)
02070                                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) %f set to %f",channel, 
02071                                     info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02072                                           *(info->demand+channel),value);
02073                                  else
02074                                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) set to %f", channel, 
02075                                     info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02076                                           value);
02077                                }
02078                              }
02079                            } // for all masks
02080                            if ((tc+k)->ns <= 0) {
02081                              if (*(info->demand+channel) != -2.f)
02082                                cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) %f set to %f",channel, 
02083                                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02084                                       *(info->demand+channel),value);
02085                              else
02086                                cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) set to %f", channel, 
02087                                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02088                                       value);
02089                            }
02090                            break;
02091                          }
02092                        } // for all channels of this type
02093                        if (gfatype[j].nc <= 0) {
02094                          if (*(info->demand+channel) != -2.f)
02095                            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) %f set to %f",channel, 
02096                                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02097                                   *(info->demand+channel),value);
02098                          else
02099                            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) set to %f", channel, 
02100                                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02101                                   value);
02102                        }
02103                        break;
02104                      } 
02105                    } // for all GFA types
02106                  }
02107                }
02108 #else
02109                if (*(info->demand+channel) != -2.f)
02110                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) %f set to %f",channel, 
02111                         info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02112                         *(info->demand+channel),value);
02113                else
02114                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d(%s) set to %f", channel, 
02115                         info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02116                         value);
02117 #endif
02118 
02119                // no :COM:2 readout therefore simulate readout of :COM:2 channel
02120                if (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,":COM:2"))
02121                  *(info->array_m+channel) = value;
02122 
02123                ca_put(DBR_FLOAT, info->pchid[channel], &value);
02124 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
02125                // GFA specific handling : maybe post pending command
02126                if (!info->handling_disabled) {
02127                  char *ds;
02128 
02129                  //   disable GFA specific handling
02130                  info->handling_disabled = TRUE;
02131 
02132                  // type and channel specific changes of other channel(s)
02133                  // when specific flags of this channel set and apply rule to new value
02134                  //  e.g. Z flag : Turn power off when new value is zero  
02135                  ds = info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*channel;
02136 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02137                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","Looking for device specific handling of Device type %s",ds);
02138 #endif
02139                  if ((strcmp(ds,"BEND")==0) || (strcmp(ds,"QUAD")==0) || 
02140                      (strcmp(ds,"SEPT")==0) || (strcmp(ds,"STER")==0) ||
02141                      (strcmp(ds,"PS"  )==0) || 
02142                      (strcmp(ds,"TS"  )==0) || (strcmp(ds,"KICKER")==0)) {
02143                    char chname[CHN_NAME_LENGTH];
02144                    char *tpos;
02145 
02146 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02147                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","Device type %s found",ds);
02148 #endif
02149                    strcpy(chname,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02150 
02151                    if ((tpos = strstr(chname,":SOL:2")) != NULL) {
02152                      int i;
02153 
02154                      strcpy(tpos,":COM:2");
02155 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02156                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","Looking for channel %s",chname);
02157 #endif
02158                      for (i = 0; i < info->num_channels; i++) {
02159                        if (i==channel) continue;
02160                        if (strcmp(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,chname)
02161                            == 0) {
02162                          float tval;
02163                          char *chflgs;
02164 
02165                          tval = (*info->demand+i); // current value of other
02166                          // evaluate channel flags of channel
02167                          chflgs = info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel;
02168                          if (strchr(chflgs,'P')) {
02169                            tval = 0.f;   // ON
02170                          }
02171                          if (strchr(chflgs,'Z')) {
02172                            if (value == 0.f)
02173                              tval = 1.f; // OFF
02174                            else
02175                              tval = 0.f; // ON
02176                          }    
02177                          if (strchr(chflgs,'N')) {
02178                            if (value > 0.f)
02179                              tval = 0.f; // ON
02180                            else
02181                              tval = 1.f; // OFF
02182                          }    
02183                          if (tval != *(info->demand+i)) {
02184                            if (*(info->found+i) && *(info->settings.used+i) &&
02185                                !*(info->settings.readonly+i)) {
02186                              HNDLE hDB;
02187                              epics_ca_set(info, i, tval, FALSE, forced_update);
02188 #ifndef OMIT_ODBUPDATE
02189                              // update ODB
02190                              cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
02191                              if (info->hkeyDemand != 0) {
02192                                INT mstatus;
02193                                mstatus = db_set_data_index(hDB, info->hkeyDemand, &tval, 
02194                                                            sizeof(float), i, TID_FLOAT);
02195                                if (mstatus != DB_SUCCESS) ; // NIY message
02196                                  
02197                              }
02198 #endif
02199                            }
02200                          }
02201                          break;  // channel found
02202                        }
02203                      }
02204                    }
02205 
02206                  } else if (strcmp(ds,"FENTE")==0) {
02207                    char chname[CHN_NAME_LENGTH];
02208                    char *tpos;
02209 
02210 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02211                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","Device type %s found",ds);
02212 #endif
02213                    strcpy(chname,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02214 
02215                    if ((tpos = strstr(chname,":SOL:2")) != NULL) {
02216                      int i;
02217 
02218                      strcpy(tpos,":COM:2");
02219 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02220                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","Looking for channel %s",chname);
02221 #endif
02222                      for (i = 0; i < info->num_channels; i++) {
02223                        if (i==channel) continue;
02224                        if (strcmp(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,chname)
02225                            == 0) {
02226                          float tval;
02227                          char *chflgs;
02228 
02229                          tval = (*info->demand+i); // current value of other
02230                          // evaluate channel flags of channel
02231                          chflgs = info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel;
02232                          if (strchr(chflgs,'V')) {
02233                            tval = 3.f;   // 3 MOVE_TO_SOL
02234                          }    
02235                          if (tval != *(info->demand+i)) {
02236                            if (*(info->found+i) && *(info->settings.used+i) &&
02237                                !*(info->settings.readonly+i)) {
02238                              HNDLE hDB;
02239 
02240                              epics_ca_set(info, i, tval, FALSE, forced_update);
02241                              // update ODB
02242                              cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
02243                              if (info->hkeyDemand != 0) {
02244                                INT mstatus;
02245                                mstatus = db_set_data_index(hDB, info->hkeyDemand, &tval, 
02246                                                            sizeof(float), i, TID_FLOAT);
02247                                if (mstatus != DB_SUCCESS) ; // NIY message
02248                              }
02249                            }
02250                          }
02251                          break;
02252                        }
02253                      }
02254                    }
02255                  } else if (strcmp(ds,"BX")==0) {
02256                    // DO NOTHING
02257                  } else if (strcmp(ds,"HVPS")==0) {
02258                    // DO NOTHING (too complicated to be handled correctly) 
02259                  } else {
02260                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","epics_ca_set: GFA type %s is currently not handled",
02261                                   ds);
02262                  }
02263                  //   enable GFA specific handling
02264                  info->handling_disabled = FALSE; 
02265                }
02266 #endif  /* #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC */
02267                if (flush) {
02268                  status = ca_pend_io(0.01);
02269 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
02270                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(0.01) status 0X%x = \"%s\"", status, 
02271                                 ca_message(status));
02272 #endif
02273                }
02274              } else {
02275                cm_msg(MLOG,"","SET: channel %d(%s) NO WRITE ACCESS!",
02276                          channel,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02277              }
02278            } else {
02279              cm_msg(MLOG,"","SET: channel %d(%s) is (currently?) not connected! "
02280                     "Channel state is %d = \"%s\"", channel, 
02281                     info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel, castate, 
02282                     castatestr(castate)); 
02283            }
02284          } else if (!*(info->found+channel)){
02285            cm_msg(MLOG,"","SET: channel %d(%s) is (currently?) not enabled!",
02286                           channel,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02287          } else if (!*(info->settings.used+channel)) {
02288            cm_msg(MLOG,"","SET: channel %d(%s) is not used!",
02289                           channel,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02290          } else if (*(info->settings.readonly+channel)) {
02291            cm_msg(MLOG,"","SET: channel %d(%s) is set read ONLY!",
02292                           channel,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02293          } else if (!*(info->iscmd+channel)){
02294            cm_msg(MLOG,"","SET: channel %d(%s) is not a channel to be set!",
02295                           channel,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02296          }
02297        } else {
02298 #ifdef MIDEBUG
02299          cm_msg(MLOG,"","Demand and readout (%f) did not change -> not updating channel"
02300                          " %d(%s)", value, channel, 
02301                          info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02302 #endif
02303        }
02304        if (info->lastset) *(info->lastset+channel) = ss_time();
02305        if (info->demand)  *(info->demand+channel)  = value;
02306      }
02307    }
02308 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02309    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_set()");
02310 #endif
02311 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
02312   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_set(channel=%d, value=%f)\n", ss_time(),
02313                   channel,value);
02314 #endif
02315    return FE_SUCCESS;
02316 }
02317 
02318 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02319 
02320 INT epics_ca_set_all(CA_INFO * info, INT channels, float value) {
02321    INT status,i;
02322 
02323 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02324    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  ++epics_ca_set_all(%d channels)",channels);
02325 #endif
02326    for (i = 0; i < MIN(info->num_channels, channels); i++)
02327      epics_ca_set(info, i, value, FALSE, FALSE);
02328 
02329    status = ca_pend_io(0.01);
02330 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
02331    cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(0.01) status 0X%x = \"%s\"", status, ca_message(status));
02332 #endif
02333 
02334 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02335    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_set_all()");
02336 #endif
02337    return FE_SUCCESS;
02338 }
02339 
02340 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02341 
02342 INT epics_ca_set_label(CA_INFO * info, INT channel, char *label) {
02343    int status;
02344    char str[256];
02345    chid chan_id;
02346 
02347 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02348    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  ++epics_ca_set_label(channel %d, label %s)", channel, label);
02349 #endif
02350    sprintf(str, "%s.DESC", info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02351    status = ca_create_channel(str, NULL, NULL, 0, &chan_id);
02352    if (status == ECA_NORMAL) {
02353      status = ca_pend_io(2.0);
02354 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
02355      cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(2.0) status 0X%x = \"%s\"", status, ca_message(status));
02356 #endif
02357      if (status == ECA_NORMAL) {
02358        if (ca_state(chan_id) == cs_conn) {
02359          status = ca_put(ca_field_type(chan_id), chan_id, label);
02360          status = ca_pend_io(0.01);
02361 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
02362          status = cm_msg(MLOG,"", "ca_pend_io(0.01) status 0X%x = \"%s\"", status, 
02363                                   ca_message(status));
02364 #endif
02365        } else {
02366          cm_msg(MLOG,"","epics_ca_set_label: Channel %s is not connected", str);
02367        }
02368      } else {
02369        cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_set_label","%s not found", str);
02370      }
02371      ca_clear_channel(chan_id);
02372    } else {
02373      cm_msg(MERROR,"epics_ca_set_label","ca_create_channel(%s) Returned status "
02374                                         "0X%x = \"%s\"",str,status,ca_message(status));
02375    }
02376 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02377    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_set_label()");
02378 #endif
02379    return FE_SUCCESS;
02380 }
02381 
02382 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02383 
02384 INT epics_ca_get(CA_INFO * info, INT channel, float *pvalue) {
02385    int status;
02386 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
02387   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : ++epics_ca_get(channel=%d(%s))\n", ss_time(),channel,
02388                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02389 #endif
02390 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02391    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  ++epics_ca_get(channel %d)",channel);
02392 #endif
02393 
02394    // NOTE: pending events will be handled in event handler callback
02395 
02396    if (channel == 0) {
02397      if (info->num_channels > 50) {
02398 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
02399        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_event(0.01)");
02400 #endif
02401        ca_pend_event(0.01);
02402      } else {
02403 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02404        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ss_sleep(50)");
02405 #endif
02406        ss_sleep(50);
02407 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
02408        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_event(0.1)");
02409 #endif
02410        ca_pend_event(0.1);
02411      }
02412      status = ca_pend_io(0.001);
02413 #ifdef MIDEBUGP
02414      cm_msg(MLOG,"","ca_pend_io(0.001) status 0X%x =\"%s\"",status,ca_message(status));
02415 #endif
02416    } else {
02417      ca_pend_event(0.001);
02418    }
02419 
02420    // return last value
02421    if (*(info->found+channel)) {
02422      if (ca_state(*(info->pchid+channel)) == cs_conn) {
02423        if (ca_read_access(*(info->pchid+channel))) { 
02424          float newdemand;
02425 
02426          newdemand = *(info->demand+channel);
02427          // process and then get demand value and also update array_m of dependent chans
02428          epics_ca_get_demand(info, channel, &newdemand);
02429          if (pvalue) *pvalue = *(info->array_m+channel);
02430 
02431          if (newdemand != *(info->demand+channel)) {
02432            // difference of DWORD not negative due to change of system time?
02433            if (ss_time() > *(info->lastset+channel)) {
02434  //          if ((ss_time() - *(info->lastset+channel)) > 60) {
02435              if ((ss_time() - *(info->lastset+channel)) > 2) {
02436 
02437                if (*(info->iscmd+channel)) {
02438                  if (*(info->demand+channel) != -2.f)
02439                    cm_msg(MLOG, "", "Channel %d(%s): demand (%f) changed to %f", channel,
02440                                     info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02441                                     *(info->demand+channel),newdemand);
02442                  else 
02443                    cm_msg(MLOG, "", "Channel %d(%s): current demand is %f", channel,
02444                                     info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
02445                                     newdemand);
02446                }
02447 
02448                if ((*(info->iscmd+channel)) && ((*(info->gchan+channel) > 0) ||
02449                    (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'F')!=NULL))){
02450                  int size;
02451                  HNDLE hDB;
02452 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
02453                  BOOL oldflag;
02454 #endif 
02455 
02456 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
02457                  oldflag = info->handling_disabled;
02458                  // maybe disable handling of GFA specific
02459                  // info->handling_disabled = TRUE;
02460 #endif 
02461                  // F flag: set new demand value (limits may be checked and set)
02462                  if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'F')!=NULL){
02463                    DWORD lastset;
02464                    // NOTE: ...ca_set() sets *(info->demand+channel) to newdemand 
02465                    //       and puts new value to "command" channel
02466                    lastset = *(info->lastset+channel); // keep lastset time
02467                    epics_ca_set(info,channel,newdemand,TRUE,FALSE); 
02468                    *(info->lastset+channel) = lastset; // restore lastset
02469                  } else {
02470                    // G flag: "status" feedback therefore not necessary to put newdemand
02471                    //         to "command" channel again
02472                    *(info->demand+channel) = newdemand;
02473                  }
02474 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
02475                  info->handling_disabled  = oldflag;
02476 #endif
02477 
02478 #ifndef OMIT_ODBUPDATE                 
02479                  // update ODB Demand
02480                  size = sizeof(float);
02481                  cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
02482                  if (info->hkeyDemand != 0) {
02483                    INT mstatus;
02484                    mstatus = db_set_data_index(hDB,info->hkeyDemand, &newdemand,
02485                                                size, channel, TID_FLOAT);
02486                    if (mstatus != DB_SUCCESS) ; // NIY message
02487                  }
02488 #endif
02489                } else
02490                  *(info->demand+channel) = newdemand;
02491                *(info->lastset+channel) = ss_time();
02492              }
02493            } else {
02494              *(info->lastset+channel) = ss_time();
02495            }
02496          }
02497          *(info->nmsg+channel) = 0;
02498        } else {
02499          if (*(info->nmsg+channel) == 0) {
02500            cm_msg(MLOG, "", "Channel %d(%s): NO read access!", channel,
02501                             info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02502            *(info->nmsg+channel) += 1;
02503          }
02504          if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'D') && pvalue)
02505            *pvalue = -1.f;
02506        }
02507      } else {
02508        if (*(info->nmsg+channel) == 0) {
02509          cm_msg(MLOG, "", "Channel %d(%s): NOT connected!", channel,
02510                           info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02511          *(info->nmsg+channel) += 1;
02512        }
02513        if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'D') && pvalue)
02514          *pvalue = -1.f;
02515      }
02516    } else {
02517      if (*(info->nmsg+channel) == 0) {
02518        if (*(info->settings.used+channel))
02519          cm_msg(MLOG, "", "Channel %d(%s): NOT found!", channel,
02520                           info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02521        *(info->nmsg+channel) += 1;
02522      }
02523      if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'D') && pvalue)
02524        *pvalue = -1.f;
02525    }
02526 
02527    // after all channels were processed once
02528    if (channel == info->num_channels-1) {
02529      // check every 10 seconds
02530      if ((ss_time() > info->lastSNC) && ((ss_time() - info->lastSNC) > 10)) { 
02531        int i,tSNC;
02532 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02533        cm_msg(MLOG,"","C-flag: Checking if channels with C-flag are connected");
02534 #endif
02535        for (i=0,tSNC=0; i < info->num_channels; i++) {
02536     //   if (*(info->found+i)&&*(info->settings.used+i)&&!*(info->settings.readonly+i)&&
02537          if (                  *(info->settings.used+i)                               &&
02538              (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'C')) && *(info->down+i)){
02539 #ifdef MIDEBUG
02540            cm_msg(MLOG,"","C-flag: Channel %d (%s) is currently not connected",i,
02541                           info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
02542 #endif
02543            tSNC++;
02544          }
02545        }
02546 
02547        if (tSNC != info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected) {
02548          cm_msg(MLOG,"","Number of Channels (with C-flag) NOT connected changed from "
02549                         "%d to %d", info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected, tSNC);
02550          info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected = tSNC;
02551          // update ODB when different
02552          if (info->hkeySNC) {
02553            HNDLE hDB;
02554            cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
02555            db_set_data(hDB, info->hkeySNC, &info->settings.Sum_NOT_Connected, 
02556                        sizeof(int), 1, TID_INT);
02557          }
02558          // reset alarm when sum is 0
02559          if ((tSNC==0) && (strncmp(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTConnected,"NONE",4) != 0))
02560            al_reset_alarm(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTConnected);
02561        }
02562        
02563        info->lastSNC = ss_time();
02564 
02565      } else if (ss_time() < info->lastSNC) {
02566        cm_msg(MLOG,"","Sum of channels NOT connected: System time was reset");
02567        info->lastSNC = ss_time();
02568      }
02569 
02570 #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC
02571      // check every 10 seconds
02572      if ((ss_time() > info->lastSNT) && ((ss_time() - info->lastSNT) > 10)) { 
02573        int i,tSNT;
02574        BOOL *handled;
02575 #ifdef MIDEBUG
02576        cm_msg(MLOG,"","T-flag: Checking if channels with T-flag are in tolerance");
02577 #endif
02578        handled = calloc(info->num_channels,sizeof(BOOL));
02579        for (i=0,tSNT=0; i < info->num_channels; i++) {
02580          // T flag set, not handled yet and tolerance > 0
02581     //   if (*(info->found+i)&&*(info->settings.used+i)&&!*(info->settings.readonly+i)&&
02582          if (                  *(info->settings.used+i)                               &&
02583              strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'T') &&
02584              (!handled || !*(handled+i)) && (*(info->settings.tolerance+i)>0.f)){
02585            if (*(info->tolchan+i) == -1.f) {
02586              char tename[CHN_NAME_LENGTH];
02587              int  j;
02588              BOOL findrefchan;
02589              char *ds;
02590              char *tpos;
02591 
02592              findrefchan = TRUE;
02593              strcpy(tename,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
02594 
02595              ds = info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*i;
02596 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02597              cm_msg(MLOG,"","Looking for device specific handling of Device type %s",ds);
02598 #endif
02599              if ((strcmp(ds,"BEND")==0) || (strcmp(ds,"QUAD")==0) || 
02600                  (strcmp(ds,"SEPT")==0) || (strcmp(ds,"STER")==0) ||
02601                  (strcmp(ds,"PS"  )==0) || 
02602                  (strcmp(ds,"TS"  )==0) || (strcmp(ds,"KICKER")==0)) {
02603 
02604 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02605                cm_msg(MLOG,"","T-flag: Device type %s found",ds);
02606 #endif
02607                // assign corresponding channel
02608                if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":SOL:2")) != NULL) {
02609                  strcpy(tpos,":IST:2");
02610                } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":IST:2")) != NULL) {
02611                  strcpy(tpos,":SOL:2");
02612                } else {
02613                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","T-flag: Channel %d (%s) not handled for type %s", i,
02614                                 info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,ds);
02615                  findrefchan = FALSE;
02616                }
02617              } else if (strcmp(ds,"FENTE")==0) {
02618                // assign corresponding channel
02619                if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":SOL:2")) != NULL) {
02620                  strcpy(tpos,":IST1:2");
02621                } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":IST1:2")) != NULL) {
02622                  strcpy(tpos,":SOL:2");
02623                } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":POSA:2")) != NULL) {
02624                  strcpy(tpos,":SOL:2");
02625                } else {
02626                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","T-flag: Channel %d (%s) not handled for type %s", i,
02627                                info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,ds);
02628                  findrefchan = FALSE;
02629                }
02630              } else if (strcmp(ds,"BX")==0) {
02631                // DO NOTHING
02632                findrefchan = FALSE;
02633              } else if (strcmp(ds,"HVPS")==0) {
02634                // assign corresponding channel NOTE: I(max) has no tolerance!
02635                if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":SOLV:2")) != NULL) {
02636                  strcpy(tpos,":ISTV:2");
02637                } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":ISTV:2")) != NULL) {
02638                  strcpy(tpos,":SOLV:2");
02639                } else {
02640                  cm_msg(MLOG,"","T-flag: Channel %d (%s) not handled for type %s", i,
02641                                info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,ds);
02642                  findrefchan = FALSE;
02643                }
02644              } else {
02645                cm_msg(MLOG,"","T-flag: Channel %d (%s) type %s is not handled", i,
02646                             info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,ds);
02647                findrefchan = FALSE;
02648              }
02649 
02650              if (findrefchan) {
02651 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02652                cm_msg(MLOG,"","T-flag: Searching for channel %s",tename);
02653 #endif
02654                for (j=0; j < info->num_channels; j++) {
02655                  if (i != j) {
02656                    if (strcmp(tename,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*j)==0){
02657                      *(info->tolchan+i) = j;
02658                      // NIY if (*(info->tolchan+j) > 0) warning channel was already
02659                      //                                 assigned
02660                      *(info->tolchan+j) = i;
02661                      break;
02662                    }
02663                  }
02664                } // for all (other) channels
02665              } else {
02666                *(info->tolchan+i) = -2.f; // mark as already processed
02667              }
02668            } // search for corresponding channels
02669 
02670            if (*(info->tolchan+i) > 0) { // tolerance needs to be checked
02671              float tvali,tvalr,diff;
02672              int   j;
02673              BOOL omit;
02674 
02675              omit = FALSE;
02676              j = *(info->tolchan+i);
02677              if (*(info->iscmd+i)) {
02678                tvali = *(info->demand+i);
02679                tvalr = *(info->array+j);
02680                // exceptions?
02681                // N flag: Power Off when Negative -> omit
02682                if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'N')&&(tvali < 0.f))
02683                  omit = TRUE;
02684              } else {
02685                tvali = *(info->array+i);
02686                tvalr = *(info->demand+j);
02687                // exceptions?
02688                // N flag: Power Off when Negative -> omit
02689                if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*j,'N')&&(tvalr < 0.f))
02690                  omit = TRUE;
02691              }
02692 
02693              diff = tvali - tvalr;
02694              if (diff < 0.f) diff = -diff;
02695              if (diff > *(info->settings.tolerance+i)) {
02696                if (!omit) {
02697                  if (*(info->intol+i) || *(info->intol+j)) {
02698                    cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d (%s)=%f and Channel %d (%s)=%f : "
02699                                   "difference %f is out of tolerance %f",
02700                                   i,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,tvali,
02701                                   j,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*j,tvalr,
02702                                   diff, *(info->settings.tolerance+i));
02703                    *(info->intol+i) = FALSE;
02704                    *(info->intol+j) = FALSE;
02705                  }
02706                  tSNT++;
02707                }
02708              } else {
02709 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02710                cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d (%s)=%f and Channel %d (%s)=%f : "
02711                               "difference %f is in tolerance %f",
02712                               i,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,tvali,
02713                               j,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*j,tvalr,
02714                               diff, *(info->settings.tolerance+i));
02715 #endif
02716                *(info->intol+i) = TRUE;
02717                *(info->intol+j) = TRUE;
02718              }
02719 
02720              if (handled) {
02721                *(handled+i) = TRUE;
02722                *(handled+j) = TRUE;
02723              }
02724 
02725            }
02726          } else {
02727 #ifdef MIDEBUG
02728          if (!*(info->settings.used+i))
02729            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d (%s): not used",i,
02730                           info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
02731          if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*i,'T') == NULL)
02732            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d (%s): T flag not set",i,
02733                           info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
02734          if (handled && *(handled+i)) 
02735            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d (%s): already handled",i,
02736                           info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i);
02737          if (*(info->settings.tolerance+i)<=0.f)
02738            cm_msg(MLOG,"","Channel %d (%s): invalid tolerance %f", i,
02739                           info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*i,
02740                           *(info->settings.tolerance+i));
02741 #endif
02742          } // channel used?
02743        } // for all channels
02744 
02745        if (info->pending > 0) {
02746            tSNT += info->pending;
02747        }
02748 
02749        if (info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance != tSNT) {
02750          // pending operations, tolerance check is not reliable 
02751          if ((info->pending > 0) && (info->pending == tSNT)) {
02752            if (info->pending == 1)
02753              cm_msg(MLOG,"","Pending operation -> In Range checking blocked");
02754            else 
02755              cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d Pending operations -> In Range checking blocked", 
02756                             info->pending);
02757              
02758          } else {
02759            if (tSNT != 0)
02760              cm_msg(MLOG,"","Number of Channels (T) NOT in Tolerance Range changed "
02761                             "from %d to %d", info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance, tSNT);
02762            else
02763              cm_msg(MLOG,"","All Channels (T) in Tolerance Range");
02764          }
02765          info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance = tSNT;
02766          // update ODB when different
02767          if (info->hkeySNT) {
02768            HNDLE hDB;
02769            cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
02770            db_set_data(hDB,info->hkeySNT,&info->settings.Sum_NOT_in_Tolerance,
02771                        sizeof(int),1,TID_INT);
02772          }
02773          // reset alarm when sum is 0
02774          if ((tSNT==0)&&(strncmp(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTinTolerance,"NONE",4) != 0))
02775            al_reset_alarm(info->settings.AlarmWhenNOTinTolerance);
02776        }
02777 
02778        info->lastSNT = ss_time();
02779        if (handled) { free(handled); handled = NULL;}
02780 
02781      } else if (ss_time() < info->lastSNT) {
02782        cm_msg(MLOG,"","Sum of channels NOT in Tolerance: System time was reset");
02783        info->lastSNT = ss_time();
02784      }
02785 #endif /* #ifdef GFA_SPECIFIC */
02786    }
02787 
02788 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02789    if (pvalue)
02790      cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_get(value = %f)",*pvalue);
02791    else
02792      cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_get(NULL pointer to return data)");
02793 #endif
02794 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
02795   if (fp) {
02796     if (pvalue)
02797       fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_get(channel=%d(%s), value=%f)\n", ss_time(), channel,
02798               info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel, *pvalue);
02799     else
02800       fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_get(channel=%d, NULL pointer to return data)\n", 
02801               ss_time(), channel);
02802   }
02803 #endif
02804    return FE_SUCCESS;
02805 }
02806 
02807 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02808 // 
02809 // return demand value of channel
02810 // handle command channels with associated G-flag
02811 //
02812 INT epics_ca_get_demand(CA_INFO * info, INT channel, float *pvalue){
02813 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
02814   if (fp) fprintf(fp,"%u : ++epics_ca_get_demand(channel=%d(%s))\n", ss_time(), channel,
02815                   info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02816 #endif
02817 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02818    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  ++epics_ca_get_demand(channel %d)",channel);
02819 #endif
02820 
02821    if (info) {
02822      if (channel < info->num_channels) {
02823 
02824        // channel number of dependent channel is not initialized yet
02825        // search for channel
02826        if (*(info->gchan+channel) == -1.f) {
02827          char tename[CHN_NAME_LENGTH];
02828          int  j;
02829          BOOL findrefchan;
02830          char *ds;
02831          char *tpos;
02832 
02833          findrefchan = TRUE;
02834          strcpy(tename,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02835 
02836          ds = info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*channel;
02837 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02838          cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: search Looking for device specific handling of Device "
02839                         "type %s", ds);
02840 #endif
02841          if ((strcmp(ds,"BEND")==0) || (strcmp(ds,"QUAD")==0) || 
02842              (strcmp(ds,"SEPT")==0) || (strcmp(ds,"STER")==0) || 
02843              (strcmp(ds,"PS"  )==0) || (strcmp(ds,"TS"  )==0) ||
02844              (strcmp(ds,"KICKER")==0)                             ) {
02845 
02846 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02847            cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: Device type %s found",ds);
02848 #endif
02849            // assign corresponding channel
02850            if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":COM:2")) != NULL) {
02851              strcpy(tpos,":STA:1");
02852            } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":STA:1")) != NULL) {
02853              strcpy(tpos,":COM:2");
02854            } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":SOL:2")) != NULL) {
02855              findrefchan = FALSE;
02856            } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":IST:2")) != NULL) {
02857              findrefchan = FALSE;
02858            } else {
02859              cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: search Channel %d (%s) not handled for type %s", 
02860                channel, info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,ds);
02861              findrefchan = FALSE;
02862            }
02863 
02864          } else if (strcmp(ds,"FENTE")==0) {
02865            // assign corresponding channel
02866            if        ((tpos = strstr(tename,":COM:2")) != NULL) {
02867              strcpy(tpos,":STA:1");
02868            } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":STA:1")) != NULL) {
02869              strcpy(tpos,":COM:2");
02870            } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":SOL:2")) != NULL) {
02871              strcpy(tpos,":IST1:2");
02872            } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":IST1:2")) != NULL) {
02873              strcpy(tpos,":SOL:2");
02874            } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":POSA:2")) != NULL) {
02875              strcpy(tpos,":SOL:2");
02876            } else {
02877              cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: search Channel %d (%s) not handled for type %s", 
02878                channel, info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,ds);
02879              findrefchan = FALSE;
02880            }
02881 
02882          } else if (strcmp(ds,"BX")==0) {
02883            if        ((tpos = strstr(tename,":COM:2")) != NULL) {
02884              strcpy(tpos,":STA:1");
02885            } else if ((tpos = strstr(tename,":STA:1")) != NULL) {
02886              strcpy(tpos,":COM:2");
02887            } else {
02888              cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: search Channel %d (%s) not handled for type %s", 
02889                channel, info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,ds);
02890              findrefchan = FALSE;
02891            }
02892 
02893          } else if (strcmp(ds,"HVPS")==0) {
02894            // DO NOTHING (no G-flags)
02895            findrefchan = FALSE;
02896          } else {
02897            if (strncmp(ds,"**",2) != 0)
02898              cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: search Channel %d (%s) type %s is not handled", 
02899                channel, info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,ds);
02900            findrefchan = FALSE;
02901          }
02902 
02903          if (findrefchan) {
02904 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
02905            cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: search Searching for channel %s",tename);
02906 #endif
02907            for (j=0; j < info->num_channels; j++) {
02908              if (channel != j) {
02909                if (strcmp(tename,info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*j)==0){
02910                  if (strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*channel,'G') ||
02911                      strchr(info->settings.chnflags+CHNFLAGS_LENGTH*j,'G')) {
02912                    *(info->gchan+channel) = j;
02913                    // NIY if (*(info->gchan+j) > 0) warning channel was already
02914                    //                               assigned to channel ...
02915                    *(info->gchan+j) = channel;
02916                    break;
02917                  }
02918                }
02919              }
02920            } // for all (other) channels
02921 
02922            if (*(info->gchan+channel) < 0) {
02923              cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: search Channel corresponding to %d (%s) NOT found!",
02924                         channel, info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel);
02925              *(info->gchan+channel) = -2.f; // mark as already processed
02926            } 
02927          } else {
02928            *(info->gchan+channel) = -2.f; // mark as already processed
02929          }
02930        } // search for corresponding channels
02931 
02932        // command/setpoint channel?
02933        if (*(info->iscmd+channel)) {
02934          if (*(info->gchan+channel) > 0) {
02935            char *ds;
02936            char *tpos;
02937            int  gchan;
02938 
02939            gchan = *(info->gchan+channel);
02940            ds = info->settings.dtype+DTYPE_LENGTH*channel;
02941 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
02942            cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: command/setpoint channel: Looking for device "
02943                           "specific handling of Device type %s",ds);
02944 #endif
02945            if ((strcmp(ds,"BEND")==0) || (strcmp(ds,"QUAD")==0) || 
02946                (strcmp(ds,"SEPT")==0) || (strcmp(ds,"STER")==0) || 
02947                (strcmp(ds,"PS"  )==0) ||
02948                (strcmp(ds,"TS"  )==0) || (strcmp(ds,"KICKER")==0)) {
02949 
02950              // update COM:2 reading STA:1 for KombiPS1 or MultiIO
02951              if (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,":COM:2")) {
02952                INT tval;
02953                tval = (int) *(info->array+gchan);
02954                // Status is ON : 0x0005 ("Soll ON" : 0x0001 and (|) "Ist ON" : 0x0004)
02955                if ((tval & 0x0005) == 0x0005) {
02956                  if (*(info->array_m+channel) != 0.f) {
02957                    if (*(info->array_m+channel) != -2.f)
02958                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Command changed to \"ON\"", channel,
02959                              info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02960                    else
02961                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Current Command is \"ON\"", channel,
02962                              info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02963                    *(info->array_m+channel) = 0.f; // command ON
02964                  }
02965                } else { // everything NOT ON is OFF
02966                  if (*(info->array_m+channel) != 1.f) {
02967                    if (*(info->array_m+channel) != -2.f)
02968                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Command changed to \"OFF\"", channel,
02969                              info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02970                    else
02971                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Current Command is \"OFF\"", channel,
02972                              info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02973                    *(info->array_m+channel) = 1.f; // command OFF
02974                  }
02975                }
02976                *(info->array_m+gchan) = *(info->array+gchan);  // update :STA:1
02977              }
02978 
02979            } else if (strcmp(ds,"FENTE")==0) {
02980              if (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,":COM:2")) {
02981                int cur, prev;
02982                cur  = (int) *(info->array  +gchan);
02983                prev = (int) *(info->array_m+gchan);
02984                // when status changed maybe update COM:2 with info from STA:1
02985                if ((cur != prev)||(*(info->array_m+channel) == -2.f)) {
02986                  // not moving anymore
02987                  if (((cur & 0x0100) != 0x0100) && ((cur & 0x0200) != 0x0200)) {
02988                    // stopped and NOT error
02989                    if ((cur & 0x0004) && ((cur & 0x0003) != 0x0003)) {
02990                      // not command STOP and not MOVE_TO_SOL?
02991                      if ((*(info->array_m+channel) != (float) 0x0002) &&
02992                          (*(info->array_m+channel) != (float) 0x0003)) {
02993                        if (*(info->array_m+channel) != -2.f)
02994                          cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Command changed to \"STOP\"", channel,
02995                                 info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02996                        else
02997                          cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Current Command is \"STOP\"", channel,
02998                                 info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
02999                        *(info->array_m+channel) = (float) 0x0002; // command STOP
03000                      }
03001                    }
03002                  }
03003                } 
03004                *(info->array_m+gchan) = *(info->array+gchan);     // update :STA:1
03005              } else if (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,
03006                                ":SOL:2")) {
03007                // NIY G-flag described in epics_ca_private.h should be handled here
03008                //
03009                // NIY SOL:2 and IST1 or POLA and :STA:1 - > maybe set SOL:2
03010                *(info->array_m+channel) = *(info->array+channel); // update :SOL:2
03011                *(info->array_m+gchan) = *(info->array+gchan);     // update IST1 or POLA
03012              }
03013 
03014            } else if (strcmp(ds,"BX") == 0) {
03015              // update COM:2 reading STA:1 for BX
03016              if (strstr(info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,":COM:2")) {
03017                INT tval;
03018                tval = (int) *(info->array+gchan);
03019                // Status is Open : 0x0001 or Closed : 0x0002
03020                if ((tval & 0x0001) == 0x0001) {
03021                  if (*(info->array_m+channel) != 0.f) {
03022                    if (*(info->array_m+channel) != -2.f)
03023                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Command changed to \"OPEN\"", channel,
03024                              info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
03025                    else
03026                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Current Command is \"OPEN\"", channel,
03027                              info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
03028                    *(info->array_m+channel) = 0.f; // command OPEN
03029                  } 
03030                } else { // NOT OPEN -> CLOSE
03031                  if (*(info->array_m+channel) != 1.f) {
03032                    if (*(info->array_m+channel) != -2.f)
03033                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Command changed to \"CLOSE\"", channel,
03034                              info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
03035                    else
03036                      cm_msg(MLOG,"","%d(%s): Current Command is \"CLOSE\"", channel,
03037                              info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel); 
03038                    *(info->array_m+channel) = 1.f; // command CLOSE
03039                  } 
03040                }
03041                *(info->array_m+gchan) = *(info->array+gchan);  // update :STA:1
03042              }
03043            } else {
03044              cm_msg(MLOG,"","G-flag: command/setpoint Channel %d (%s) type %s is not han"
03045                "dled", channel, info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel,ds);
03046            }
03047          } else {
03048            // no corresponding "status" channel -> mirror demand readout of channel
03049            *(info->array_m+channel) = *(info->array+channel);
03050          }
03051 
03052          if (pvalue) *pvalue = *(info->array_m+channel);
03053 
03054        // not a command channel
03055        } else {
03056          // and no corresponding command channel -> mirror readout of channel
03057          if (*(info->gchan+channel) < -1.f)
03058            *(info->array_m+channel) = *(info->array+channel);
03059          if (pvalue) *pvalue = 0.f; // NO demand value to return
03060        }
03061      }
03062    }
03063 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
03064    if (pvalue)
03065      cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_get_demand(value = %f)",*pvalue);
03066    else
03067      cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_get_demand(NULL pointer to return)");
03068 #endif
03069 #ifdef MIDEBUGF
03070   if (fp) {
03071     if (pvalue)
03072       fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_get_demand(channel=%d(%s), value=%f)\n", ss_time(),
03073                  channel, info->settings.channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH*channel, *pvalue);
03074     else
03075       fprintf(fp,"%u : --epics_ca_get_demand(channel=%d,NULL pointer to return demand)\n"
03076               ,ss_time(), channel);
03077   }
03078 #endif
03079    return FE_SUCCESS;
03080 }
03081 
03082 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
03083 INT epics_ca_get_all(CA_INFO * info, INT channels, float *pvalue) {
03084    int i;
03085 
03086 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
03087    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  ++epics_ca_get_all(%d channels)", channels);
03088 #endif
03089    for (i = 0; i < MIN(info->num_channels, channels); i++)
03090      epics_ca_get(info, i, pvalue + i);
03091 
03092 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
03093    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_get_all()");
03094 #endif
03095    return FE_SUCCESS;
03096 }
03097 
03098 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
03099 INT epics_ca_get_default_name(CA_INFO *info, INT channel, char *name) {
03100 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
03101    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  ++epics_ca_get_default_name(channel %d, name %s)", channel, name);
03102 #endif
03103    if ((name != NULL) && (channel >= 0) && (channel< info->num_channels)) {
03104      strcpy(name, info->settings.channel_names + CHN_NAME_LENGTH * channel);
03105    }
03106 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
03107    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_get_default_name(channel %d, name %s)", channel, name);
03108 #endif
03109    return FE_SUCCESS;
03110 }
03111 
03112 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
03113 
03114 INT epics_ca_get_default_threshold(CA_INFO *info, INT channel, float *pvalue) {
03115 
03116 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
03117    cm_msg(MLOG,"","  ++epics_ca_get_default_threshold(channel %d)", channel);
03118 #endif
03119    if (pvalue != NULL) {
03120      *pvalue = 0.1f;
03121      if (info->threshold && (channel >= 0) && (channel < info->num_channels))
03122        *pvalue = *(info->threshold+channel);
03123    }
03124 #ifdef MIDEBUG1
03125    if (pvalue)
03126      cm_msg(MLOG,"","  --epics_ca_get_default_threshold(channel %d, threshold %f)", 
03127                     channel, *pvalue);
03128 #endif
03129    return FE_SUCCESS;
03130 }
03131 
03132 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
03133 
03134 INT epics_ca(INT cmd, ...) {
03135    va_list argptr;
03136    HNDLE hKey;
03137    INT channel, status;
03138    DWORD flags;
03139    float value, *pvalue;
03140    CA_INFO *info;
03141    char *label;
03142 
03143    va_start(argptr, cmd);
03144    status = FE_SUCCESS;
03145 
03146 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
03147    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca(CMD=%d)",cmd);
03148 #endif
03149    if (cmd == CMD_INIT) {
03150      void *pinfo;
03151 
03152      hKey    = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
03153      pinfo   = va_arg(argptr, void *);
03154      channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03155      flags   = va_arg(argptr, DWORD);
03156      status  = epics_ca_init(hKey, pinfo, channel);
03157      if (pinfo) {
03158        info = *(CA_INFO **) pinfo;
03159        if (info) info->flags = flags;
03160      }
03161    } else {
03162      info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
03163 
03164      /* only execute command if enabled */
03165      if (!info || info->cmd_disabled) {
03166        ss_sleep(100);
03167 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
03168        cm_msg(MLOG,"","ss_sleep(100)");
03169 #endif
03170        status = FE_ERR_DISABLED;
03171      } else {
03172        switch (cmd) {
03173          case CMD_INIT:
03174             break;
03175 
03176          case CMD_EXIT:
03177             status = epics_ca_exit(info);
03178             break;
03179 
03180          case CMD_SET:
03181             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03182             value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
03183             status = epics_ca_set(info, channel, value, TRUE, FALSE);
03184             break;
03185 
03186          case CMD_SET_ALL:
03187             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03188             value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
03189             status = epics_ca_set_all(info, channel, value);
03190             break;
03191 
03192          case CMD_SET_LABEL:
03193             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03194             label = va_arg(argptr, char *);
03195             //status = epics_ca_set_label(info, channel, label);
03196             status = FE_SUCCESS;
03197             break;
03198 
03199          case CMD_GET:
03200             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03201             pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
03202             status = epics_ca_get(info, channel, pvalue);
03203             break;
03204 
03205          case CMD_GET_DEMAND:
03206             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03207             pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
03208             status = epics_ca_get_demand(info, channel, pvalue);
03209             break;
03210 
03211          case CMD_GET_ALL:
03212             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03213             pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
03214             status = epics_ca_get_all(info, channel, pvalue);
03215             break;
03216 
03217          case CMD_GET_DEFAULT_NAME:
03218             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03219             label = va_arg(argptr, char *);
03220             status = epics_ca_get_default_name(info, channel, label);
03221             break;
03222 
03223          case CMD_GET_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD:
03224             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
03225             pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
03226             status = epics_ca_get_default_threshold(info, channel, pvalue);
03227             break;
03228 
03229          default:
03230 #ifdef MIDEBUG
03231    cm_msg(MLOG,"","**epics_ca(CMD=%d) is not handled",cmd);
03232 #endif
03233             break;
03234        }
03235      }
03236    }
03237 
03238    va_end(argptr);
03239 
03240 #ifdef MIDEBUG2
03241    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca()");
03242 #endif
03243    return status;
03244 }
